The loan will be used to purchase plastic chairs for customers to sit on, and will help Anmoli to generate greater profits and improve the quality of life for his family. Anmoli hopes that in the future he will be able to continue to grow his business. 

Anmoli is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Anmoli who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to purchase plastic chairs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jean Damasene

texts.en:
Jean Damascene is 28 years old, married, and the father of two children ages 2 and 5.

He  has been operating a well-organized business selling shoes for five years. It is open from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. daily, and he employs one person to help him. 

Jean Damascene has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more shoes to sell. He plans to save for his family's future and to reinvest in his business with his profits.

loans.use: To purchase more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Simiren

texts.en:
Simiren has been a farmer for the last five years. He is 35 years old, married to Caroline who is a housewife, and they are blessed with three children.

He learned about KADET from the marketing done by the KADET staff in his area. This is his fourth loan which he plans to spend to purchase farm supplies. He intends to use the returns from the loan to re-invest in farming and buy a bigger farm.

His dreams are to be the best, well-known farmer in the area. He is an industrious man who can do well if funded.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies

loans.name: C4603 Inganji Group

texts.en:
Jean Damascene is 25 years old and he is married with 1 child who is 3 years old. He is the president of a group that is called "Inganji" in the local language. The group is composed of six people: four men and two women. (Jean Damascene is the first person on the right side in the photo) and he sells Irish potatoes, bananas, sweet potatoes etc. This business is well organized. He employs two people to help him. Jean Damascene has been in this business for about three years.
Jean Damascene has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more quantity of bananas, Irish potatoes,rice,sugar and so on. With the resulting profit, Jean Damascene will be able to reinvest in the business and to pay medical insurance.

loans.use: To purchase more food products like Irish potatoes, sweet potatoes, and bananas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase additional supplies for his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a shaving machine.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es: LA SEÑORA  LORENZA, es una persona de 49 años de edad, de estado civil casada, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive actualmente con su esposo y ya no cuenta con dependientes económicos a cargo. La actividad económica de la cliente y su esposo es la producción agrícola y los principales productos que cultiva  son la papa, haba, arveja y papa lisa en sus propios terrenos que se hallan ubicadas en la comunidad de Villa Mojón del municipio de Pocona que esta distante a 101 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora O. guanto a su esposo manifiestan ser personas responsables y trabajadores que quieren incrementar su producción agrícola y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar el presente capital de inversión para la compra de fertilizantes químicos y  abono de gallinaza que son los principales insumos que promueven un mejor rendimiento de los cultivos agrícolas.
texts.en: 49 year old Lorenza is married, achieved a primary school education, and currently lives with her husband and does not have any economic dependents in her charge. She and her husband have an agricultural business and the main crops they cultivate are potatoes, beans, peas, and a root vegetable called papa lisa. They grow these on their own land in the community of Villa Mojón in the municipality of Pocona which is 101km from the city of Cochabamba. O. and her husband are responsible and hardworking people who want to increase their agricultural production and for this reason they are requesting the present loan to buy chemical fertilizer and chicken manure fertilizer which are the main inputs that promote a better agricultural yield.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and chicken manure fertilizer

loans.name: Arnold

texts.en:
Arnold is a married man. He has 2 children and his wife works as a tailor. Arnold operates a sewing business and sells his goods in a shop. He's worked in this business for 6 years. His primary customers are students and passerby. He rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. He describes his greatest business challenges to be seasonality and transportation 

Arnold will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase sewing materials like cloth and needles. Arnold aspires to continue expanding business in the future. He joined Yehu to access working capital.

loans.use: To purchase sewing materials like cloth and needles.

loans.name: Blanca Adriana

texts.es: Blanca Adriana tiene 43 años, su actividad es la venta de comercios. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio. Inicio con fondos propios ya que tiene bajo su cargo a 3 hijos menores de edad. Ella ofrece sus productos de manera ambulante y en su vivienda ya que algunos clientes conocen la amplia variedad de productos que ofrece. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de polvos, cremas, tratamientos, pintura de uñas, pintura de labios, tratamiento y otros mas.
texts.en: 43 year old Blanca Adriana sells goods. She has had her business for more than 5 years. She began with her own funds as she had three young children in her care. She sells her goods door to door and from her home and her clients know the wide variety of products that she offers. She is requesting this loan so that she can buy powders, creams, treatments, nail polish, lipstick, and other things.

loans.use: to buy powders, creams, treatments, nail polish, lipstick, and other things.

loans.name: Augusto

texts.es:
Augusto de 50 años de edad, vive en su casa propia con su familia, la cual cuentan con servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de Nueva Arica que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se dedica al comercio, agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Desde hace varios años, cuenta con su propio negocio que lo a colocado en su mismo domicilio en donde ofrece a sus clientes todo lo que es productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en general. Cuenta con una clientela establecida, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus obligaciones familiares.

Augusto observa que su negocio va creciendo favorablemente. Desea seguir ampliando su negocio con la compra de más mercadería como productos de consumo diario y abarrotes para surtir su tienda.  Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1,000 nuevos soles. Augusto es muy trabajador y responsable, desea lograr mayores ingresos para tener un negocio más amplio y bien surtido, con el objetivo que con las ganancias pueda brindarlemejores estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Augusto is 50 years old. He lives in his own home with his family. It has running water and electricity and is located in the district of Nueva Arica, which belongs to the province of Chiclayo. This area's main activities are trade, agriculture, cattle ranching and tourism. 

For several years, he has had his own business located in his home. He offers his customers all types of products of basic necessity and general groceries. He has his established customer base. With the income he receives, he will be able to pay for his family obligations. 

Augusto has seen his business grow. He wants to expand his business by buying more merchandise such as products of daily consumption and groceries to stock his store. To do this he has decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles. Augusto is very hardworking and responsible. He wants to achieve a higher income to have a bigger and better stocked business, His aim is to offer a better education to his children with his earnings.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise such as products of daily consumption and groceries to stock his store.

loans.name: C13015 Dufashanye Group

texts.en:
Eugenie is 37 years old and is married with one child who is 20 years old. She is the leader of this group, which is called "Dufashanye" in the local language. The group is composed of five women only. Eugenie is the first person on the left side in the photo. Eugenie sells groceries (cooking oil, salt, water, juice, etc) and she has three years in her business. Her business is open from 6 am until 8 pm every day.  

Eugenie has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via vision finance company in order to purchase more quantity of sugar,cooking oil,water,juice to sell. With this profits from the loan, Eugenie would like to satisfy the basic needs of her family, reinvest in the businesses and start saving for the future.

loans.use: To purchase more sugar, cooking oil, salt, water, juice, etc.

loans.name: Johnstone

texts.en:
Johnstone is a married man. He has 3 children and all are currently enrolled in school. Johnstone and his wife are both musicians and sell their recordings. He's worked in this business for 7 years and his primary customers are church members. Johnstone also owns a side business farming local crops. He rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. He describes his greatest business challenge to be piracy and his largest monthly expenses are school fees and rent. 

Johnstone will use the Kes 20,000 loan to record another CD. Johnstone aspires to have his own recording studio in the future. He joined Yehu because of their efficient loan products.

loans.use: To record another CD.

loans.name: Cissy

texts.en: Cissy lives in  Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has 4 children, all of whom are in school.  She also takes care of additional family members (father). Cissy has a business of selling second hand clothes.  She has been in this business for 1 year, and she works 7 days out of every week. Cissy sells her products in a shop, by means of retail. Cissy has requested for a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bales of second hand clothes. The main business challenge(s) for Cissy include transportation and thieves. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start selling on wholesale only and also to open up another shop selling clothes. Cissy lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and has access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bales of second hand clothes

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret lives in Uganda. She is married and has 7 children, six of whom are in school.  Margaret has a business of a pub. She has been in this business for 10 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Margaret sells her products at the market, by means of retail. Margaret has requested  for a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more jerycans of local Gin and crates of Beer. The main business challenges for Margaret include rainy season and thieves. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a fully stocked pub. Margaret lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding family.

loans.use: To buy more crates of beer and jerycans of local Gin

loans.name: G.s. Los Amigos Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Los Amigos lo conforman  Jorge Luis, Mariela, Ana y Francisco. El señor Jorge tiene 27 años. Solicita un crédito para invertirlo en su negocio que es la venta de huevos al por mayor y al detalle, sus ventas las realiza en su casa de habitación y de manera ambulante, tiene 6 años de tener este negocio. Mariela tiene 28 años se dedica a la venta de artesanías de manera ambulante, sus compras las realiza en el mercado. Ella dio inicio con el negocio desde hace 2 años, fue con ayuda de sus familiares que la apoyaron con el capital inicial para que saliera adelante y además recibió ayuda de otros comerciantes que tenían experiencia en este medio. Ana Patricia tiene su negocio que es la venta de nacatamales, frijoles y elabora sopa, esto varia diariamente buscando lo que el  cliente quiera. Su mayor desafío es realizar la compra de equipos para el negocio debido a que actualmente no tiene y tiene que usar los utensilios de su casa. Ella inicio el negocio con ayuda de su papa que le aparto capital de trabajo para que ella trabajara y saliera adelante debido a que en nuestro país es difícil conseguir empleo. Francisco el señor se dedica a la venta de huevos de manera ambulante y en su casa de habitación. El señor solicita este nuevo crédito para invertirlo en su negocio y surtir mas el mismo, además que al realizar compras grandes obtiene descuentos que no tiene cuando compra al por menor.
texts.en: The communal bank "Los Amigos" is made up of members Jorge Luis, Mariela, Ana and Francisco. Jorge is 27 years old.  He requests a loan to invest in his business selling eggs at wholesale and retail. He makes his sales from his house, and also in an itinerant manner.  He has had this business for 6 years.  Mariela is 28 years old and has a business selling handicrafts.  She buys her products in the market and sells from place to place.  She started up this business 2 years ago; her relatives helped her  by contributing the startup capital so that she could get the business going.  She also received help from other merchants who had experience in this line of work.  Ana Patricia has a business selling nacatamales (a traditional Nicaraguan tamal), beans and soup.  Her menu varies daily in order to accommodate the demands of her customers.  Her main challenge is to buy equipment for the business.  At this time, she does not have this equipment and so she uses utensils from her house.  She started this business with the help of her father, who set aside working capital so that she would be able to work and get ahead, since in this country it is difficult to find work.  Francisco has a business selling eggs from place to place, and also from his house.  He requests this new loan to invest in his business and stock it with more eggs; the loan will also allow him to make a big purchase and obtain a discount that he could not get if he buys the eggs at retail.

loans.use: to buy eggs

loans.name: Zoraida

texts.es: La socia Zoraida está solicitando el préstamo para abastecer su pequeña tienda de abarrotes y desea comprar por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, tarros de leche, menestras y otras cosas más. El anterior crédito a la socia le ayudo para incrementar sus ventas por lo tanto obtuvo buenas ganancias de la cuales lo destino para la alimentación y educación de sus hijos. La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Zoraida is asking for a loan in order to supply her little grocery store and she wants to buy, for example, bags of rice, bags of sugar, large containers of milk, beans and other items. 

The last loan helped her to increase her sales, which increased her profits and enabled her to feed and educate her children. She is very grateful for the loan and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy bags of rice, bags of sugar, large containers of milk, beans and other items to supply her grocery store

loans.name: Fatima Del Rosario

texts.es: Fátima Del Rosario tiene 44 años, su actividad es la venta y destace de cerdo. Hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio, ella tiene ciertas dificultades como es el tiempo pues tiene que realizar los quehaceres del hogar además de esto tiene que dedicarse a su negocio pero la amplia experiencia obtenida le ha brindado la ayuda para mejorar cada día. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de cerdos.
texts.en: Fatima Del Rosario is 44 years old, and she has a business butchering and selling pigs.  She has had this business for more than 10 years.  She faces certain difficulties, such as managing her time, because she must carry out the household chores as well as dedicating herself to this business.  However, the ample experience that she has obtained in this line of work helps her to improve each day.  The reason she is taking this loan is so that she can buy some pigs.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar de 37 años de edad, vive en su casa propia con su familia, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del departamento de la Cajamarca.  Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad principal es la minería, comercio, agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

Oscar tiene como actividad laboral la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene en su casa, cuenta con su propia clientela y también realiza trabajos a pedidos, la competencia en el rubro no es mucha, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 2000 para comprar material y dar mantenimiento a su máquina, ha así puede seguir brindando un buen servicio y cumpliendo con los pedidos que le han hecho sus clientes, lo que le permitirá tener más ganancias para mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.  Oscar con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar su negocio y a su familia adelante y a que  se superen en la vida.
texts.en:
Oscar is 37 years old, he lives with his family in a house of his own equipped with the basic services and located in the urban area of the Cajamarca department. The main activities of the area are mining, trading, agriculture, livestock breeding and tourism.

Oscar created and sells clothes and he has been engaged in this activity for various years. His workshop is located in his house, he can count on recurring customers and he also makes clothes to order. The competition in this field is not tight, and with the money he earns he is able to pay for the necessities of his family.

He has requested a loan to Edpyme Alternativa though Capital Semilla de 2000 to buy materials and to pay for maintenance works on his sewing machine, so that he can continue providing a good service to his customers and realizing the clothes he has been requested. In this way he will be able to earn more in order to improve his family’s standard of living. With great effort and hard work Oscar has been able to make his activity progress and to provide for his family and for them to become someone in life.

loans.use: To buy materials to create clothes and to pay for maintenace works on his sewing machine.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet lives in Uganda.  She is married and has 2 children, all of whom are in school.  Juliet has a business of a pub.  She has been in this business for 3 years, and she works 7 days out of every week. Juliet sells her products at the market, by means of retail.  Juliet has requested for a loan of 700,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bales of second hand clothes.  The main business challenge(s) for Juliet   include rainy season and thieves.  Her goals and aspirations for her business are to start importing clothes.  Juliet lives in a home that she rents; she doesn't have access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding family.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.es:
Rosenda de 53 años de edad. Vive en su casa propia con sus familiares, cuentan con servicio de luz solamente, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Los pobladores de esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Desde hace varios años, cuenta con su propio negocio que lo a colocado en su domicilio, por tener más seguridad, donde ofrece a sus clientes todo lo que es productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. Cuenta con una clientela establecida, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus necesidades de su casa.

Rosenda se a dado cuenta que su negocio va creciendo favorablemente en el transcurso de los días. Desea seguir ampliando su negocio con la compra de más mercadería como productos de consumo diario y abarrotes en general para satisfacer la necesidad de sus clientes.  Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles. Rosenda es muy trabajadora y responsable, desea lograr mayores ingresos para tener más comodidades y tener mejoras económicas en la vida.
texts.en:
Rosenda is 53 years old. She lives in her own house with her family. They have only electricity. The house is located in the rural part of the Tambogrande district in the department of Piura. The people of this area dedicate themselves to agriculture, ranching, and handcrafts.

For several years, she has had her own business located in her home, in order to have more security, where she offers her clients all staple items and groceries. She has an established clientele, and with the income that she may earn, she will cover her household needs. 

Rosenda has realized that her business is growing favorably as time passes. She wants to continue adding to her business with the purchase of more merchandise, such as everyday products and groceries in general, in order to satisfy the needs of her customers. For that, she has decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles. Rosenda is very hard-working and responsible. She wants to achieve greater income to have more comforts and economic improvement in her life.

loans.use: to purchase more everyday products and groceries in general to satisfy the needs of her customers

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es: La Sra. Felipa  es clienta antigua D. la institución,  mostrando responsabilidad   en los pagos D. sus cuotas cuenta con una buena actitud moral, ella tiene la determinación D. mejorar el negocio D. comida,  y que este sea conocido por la variedad D. platos que ofrece.  La señora Felipa es emprendedora, el puesto D. venta  se  encuentra en la  zona D. villa Tunari D. la ciudad D. el Alto, Bolivia, la señora se esfuerza por superarse ya que trabaja desD. la madrugada hasta que se pone el sol, el esposo  ayuda en la atención D. la pensión  el  apoya ese sueño D. convertirse en  una empresaria, con el dinero del crédito ampliara su pensión, comprando mesas y sillas ya que tiene mucha clientela, el mayor anhelo D. la clienta es llegar a ser reconocida por la sociedad en su lucha D. mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Felipa is an old customer of this institution. She has proven herself to be responsible in the repayments of her dues and she is of good moral values. She is determined to improve her food production activity in order to become popular for the variety of dishes she offers. Felipa is a resourceful person, and her stall is located in Villa Tunari, a neighbourhood of El Alto, Bolivia. She works hard to improve herself, working from dusk till dawn. Her husband helps her tending to the café and he also supports her dream of becoming an businesswoman. The loan she is requesting will be used to enlarge her café by buying tables and chairs as they have many customers. Her main wish is for people to acknowledge her efforts to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To make improvements to her café.

loans.name: Migdalia Del Carmen

texts.es: Migdalia Del Carmen tiene 41 años, su actividad es la pesca artesanal. Tiene más de 15 años en este negocio esta es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues a pesar de que no es fácil sacar adelante su negocio debido a los diferentes problemas que atraviesa esto no la desanima a seguir adelante con este medio de vida. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de una lancha para proporcionar más ingresos a su hogar.
texts.en: Migdalia Del Carmen is 41 years old and she is a fisherwoman, an activity she has been engaged in for 15 years. This is the first time she is requesting a loan, and even though it is not easy to carry on her activity owing to the different problems she has to face, she is not discouraged and she keeps on engaging in this activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a small boat in order to earn more money for her family.

loans.use: To buy a small boat.

loans.name: Víctor Guadalupe

texts.es: El Sr. Víctor, es un empleado de una tienda de auto partes, él y su apreciable esposa acudieron a la institución para solicitar un préstamo para comprar un portón para su vivienda ya que su casa actualmente  no  cuenta  con  uno  y nos  comenta  que  desea  brindarle  más  seguridad para su niño pequeño de cinco años, posteriormente quieren pintar el exterior de  su  domicilio, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado para  la realización de  su proyecto.
texts.en:
Victor is an employee in a repair shop. 

He and his sensible wife came to the institution for a loan to buy a gate for their house as they currently do not have one. He tell us that he wants to give his little five year old son more security. 

At a later time he wants to paint the outside of his house. 

He is grateful for the support that helps him with this project.

loans.use: to buy and to pay for installation of a security gate for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cooking utensils and supplies in order to continue making her tasty food so she can give her clients good service

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio Cesar tiene 49 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, Julio tiene 3 hijos de 16, 21 y 27 años. El no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera profesional ha sido por este negocio que el mantiene a su familia. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de bolsos, calzado, cosméticos, sabanas, prendas de oro y plata.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is 49 and sells general merchandise. He has had this business for three years. Julio has three children, ages 16, 21 and 27.  He didn't have the opportunity to study for a professional career, and it has been through this business that he supports his family. 

The purpose of the loan is to buy purses, shoes, sheets, as well as gold and silver items.

loans.use: To buy purses, shoes, cosmetics, sheets, as well as gold and silver items.

loans.name: Luis Javier

texts.es:
Luis de 25 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en su casa propia, cuentan con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola y ganadera que se encuentra situada en el departamento de Piura.

Luis brinda servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su mototaxi, un vehículo que consiste de una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior (máximo 3 personas), la actividad que realiza lo hace durante todo el día hasta las 6 de la tarde, a pesar de la competencia en el rubro trata de obtener los ingresos necesarios para solventar su necesidades familiares.

Desea solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles para usarlo en el mantenimiento y cambio de llantas a su mototaxi. Necesita mantener sus mototaxi en buenas condiciones para seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio a sus clientes. Con la ayuda del préstamo, espera aumentar sus ingresos y seguir ayudando económicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 25, and lives with his family in their own house, which has water and electricity service. It is in Tambogrande district, an area known for farming and livestock-raising, located in Piura department. 

Luis transports passengers in his moto taxi (motorcycle taxi), a vehicle that consists of a motorcycle and a cabin for carrying passengers (maximum of three persons). He does this work all day long until six in the afternoon.  

In spite of the competition in this sector, he is trying to earn the necessary income to meet his household expenses.  He wishes to apply to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 800 nuevos soles to use for maintaining his moto taxi, and changing the tires. He needs to maintain his moto taxi in good condition to continue offering a good service to his customers. With the help of the loan he hopes to increase his income, and continue helping his family financially.

loans.use: To maintain his motorcycle taxi, and change the tires.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es: Abel e Iris son una pareja que  tiene  cuatro años D.   casados y tienen un pequeño hijo el cual  es  lo mas importante  en su   vida, día  con día  ellos se  esfuerzan por  brindarle  a  su  pequeño  una   excelente  estabilidad, en esta  ocasión ellos   solicitan D. nuestro  apoyo  para L. realización D.  su proyecto   el  cual consiste en realizar una  mejora  en su   vivienda  tal  como  colocar   vitropiso   en  el interior D.  su casa, ve  en el crédito L.  posibilidad  D.  ofrecer  a   sus   familiares  y amigos  una  excelente   estabilidad  cuando0o  lo  visitan.
texts.en:
Abel and Iris are a couple who have been married for four years. They have a young son who is the most important thing in their lives.  Day after day, they do their best to proviD. their little one with good stability.

On this occasion they are applying for our help in undertaking a home improvement project. It consists of installing tile in the interior of their house. They see in the loan the opportunity of offering their family members and friends a stable household when they visit.

loans.use: To install tile in the interior of his house.

loans.name: Nereida Del Rosario

texts.es: Nereyda Del Rosario tiene 35 años, su actividad es la venta de helados. Tiene más de 8 años en este negocio el sacrificio que realiza diariamente ella es una persona muy emprendedora se siente muy feliz con este crédito pues es la primera vez que lo realiza. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de dulces, gomas, bolsas, conos de galletas, helados, entre otros.
texts.en:
Nereida Del Rosario is 35, and sells ice cream. She has been in this business for more than eight years. 

She makes daily sacrifices for her business, and is a very enterprising person. She feels very happy about the loan, since it is the first time that she has had one. The purpose of the loan is to buy candy, gum, bags, waffle cones, ice cream and other things.

loans.use: To buy candy, gum, bags, waffle cones, ice cream, and other things.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: La señora Beatriz es una clienta que se dedica a la venta D. condimentos y especias, estas ventas las realiza en las distintas provincias que cuenta la cuidad D. La Paz, su labor empieza D. horas 5:00 am hasta las 14: 00 pm aproximadamente. La  señora Beatriz es viuda hace ya tres años, nos cuenta que fue difícil soportar  la perdida D. su esposo y que con el trabajo que realiza y el apoyo D. su familia,  pudo superar esta perdida, no cuenta con hijos en edad escolar, pero si con  nietos a quienes cuida y entrega su amor por las tardes. La señora Beatriz vive en la ciudad D. el Alto-La Paz, Bolivia Su mayor sueño es que algún día llegar a ser una empresaria en la venta D. especias y exportar a otros países estos productos y estos condimenten sus alimentos con los deliciosos condimentos Bolivianos, con el dinero del crédito comprara condimentos (ají, comino, especias en general), es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a client who sells condiments and spices. These sales are carried out in the different provinces of La Paz department. Her work begins at 5:00am. and ends at approximately 2:00pm. 

Beatriz has been a widow for three years now. She tells us that it was difficult to bear the loss of her husband. With the work she does, and the support of her family, she managed to overcome this loss. She doesn't have school age children, but she does look after her grandchildren in the afternoon, and gives them her love.  

Beatriz lives in the city of El Alto-La Paz, Bolivia. Her greatest dream is that some day she will become an entrepreneur in the sale of spices, and export these products to other countries, so that people in those countries can season their food with delicious Bolivian spices.

She will use the loan to buy condiments (chili pepper, cumin, and spices in general). She is a very hard-working person, and grateful to the institution for their support.

loans.use: To buy condiments (chili pepper, cumin, spices in general).

loans.name: Odili

texts.es: Odili se dedica a la venta de cosméticos ambúlate. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio. Tiene 1 hijo de cuatro años a su cargo, pues la mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan diferentes pedidos. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de cremas, tratamientos, shampoo, polvos, perfumes entre otras cosas. Sueña con ampliar su negocio y al mismo tiempo obtener nuevos clientes y al mismo tiempo proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Odili sells cosmetics from door to door. She has had this business for more than three years. She has one four year-old son in her care.  The majority of her customers place various orders with her.  

The purpose of the loan is to buy creams, treatments, shampoo, powders, and other beauty products. She dreams of expanding her business, obtaining new customers and making improvements to her house.

loans.use: To buy creams, treatments, shampoos, powders, perfumes and other beauty products.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is a married woman with three school-going children. Her husband is a fisherman who contributes to providing the family's basic needs. She has a house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children. 

She has operated a leso (kanga) selling business for the past three years. Her potential clients are her neighbors and friends. She faces a major challenge of transport charges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop for selling lesos.

With the KSHS 20,000, she wants to purchase more lesos and boost her business. She decided to join Yehu because of its flexible policies, which favor client’s needs.

loans.use: To purchase more lesos

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy candy, basic staples, soft drinks, eggs, noodles, bottled water, cream, cookies, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es:
Angelina tiene 46 años de edad, esta acompañada, y es madre de cuatro hijos. Angelina se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y gallinas a pequeña escala. Ella empezó a dedicarse a dicho oficio hace treinta años. Para dedicarse al engorde de cerdos y gallinas, Angelina compra los animales pequeños en una plaza que queda a 15km de distancia de su casa. Ella luego los vende en la misma plaza, 3 veces por mes.

Angelina ha solicitado un préstamo a Fundación Campo para comprar cuatros cerdos pequeños y 15 pollos. Tambien ella comprará tres sacos de concentrado y los medicamentos necesarios para prevenir que los animales se enfermen. Con el préstamo Angelina podra ayudar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa; ya que él se dedica a la agricultura y los ingresos de esta actividad se obtienen de forma estacional. Los ingresos adicionales también le permitirán disponer de un poco más de efectivo para comprar los artículos de primera necesidadpara sus hijos.

En un futuro Angelina planea construir una galera pequeña para los cerdos. Su intención es comprar cerdas reporductoras, de manera que no tenga que estar comprando cerdos pequeños.
texts.en:
Angelina is 46, has a partner, and is the mother of four children. Angelina raises pigs and chickens on a small scale. She began to do this work 30 years ago.  

To make a living fattening pigs and chickens, Angelina buys small animals in a square 15km from her house. Then she sells them in the same square three times a month. Angelina has applied to Fundación Campo for a loan, in order to buy four small pigs and 15 chickens.

She will also buy three bags of feed concentrate, and the drugs needed to prevent the animals from getting sick. With the loan, Angelina will be able to help her husband by contributing to the family income, as he is a farmer and the income from this work is seasonal. The additional income will also allow her to have a little more cash available to buy basic household necessities for her children. 

In the future, Angelina plans to build a small shed for the pigs. She intends to buy breeding sows, so that she doesn't have to be buying small pigs.

loans.use: To buy four pigs and 15 chickens to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase the inventory of his business by buying 20 crates of beverages

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a single woman with two school-going children. She lives in a rental house with neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children. 

She has operated a food stall for the past three years; her potential clients are the local area residents. She faces a major challenge of seasonality. She dreams of opening another type of business like a cereals shop. 

With the 15,000 Kenyan Shilling (KES) loan she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil for her food stall. She decided to join Yehu because of easy access to loan facilities.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and cooking oil for her food stall.

loans.name: Faraja Group

texts.fr: Mutoo, leader du groupe « Faraja », âgée de 32 ans, mariée et mère de 7 enfants dont le fils ainé  a 14 ans et le cadet 4 mois. Elle est vendeuse de sacs à mains dans le petit marché local appelé TMK. Son mari est un  comptable dans une division publique. Son capital initial fut de  200$.  Il y a de  cela 13 ans révolus qu’elle exerce cette activité. Avec ce nouveau crédit, la cliente va acheter 1 ballon de sacs  à mains à marchander. Cependant, elle souhaite voir ses enfants grandir et accroitre son entreprise. Ainsi, elle remercie l’IMF Hekima, pour son appui en micro crédit.
texts.en: Mutoo, the leader of Faraja Group, is 32 years old, married and the mother of seven children. The eldest is 14 years old and the youngest 4 months. She sells handbags at the small local market called TMK. Her husband is an accountant in a public organization. Mutoo's start-up capital amounted to $200. She has been in her activity for the past 13 years. She will use this new loan to buy one bale of handbags for resale. Mutoo wants to see her children grow up and her business expand. She thanks the microfinance institution Hekima for its support with microloans.

loans.use: to buy one bale of handbags.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El Sr. José es un hombre que a luchado mucho en la vida  para  salir  adelante, gracias  a su esfuerzo y perseverancia  logro  comprar  un terrero  donde  desea  construir  su  casa, es  por ello  que  acudió  con nosotros  para que lo apoyemos en su proyecto  ,  el cual  consiste   en la compra  de  material de  construcción para   empezar  levantando las  bardas  de un  cuarto, ve  en  el  crédito la posibilidad  de  hacer  su  sueño  realidad  por  lo que  se  encuentra  muy contento de  habernos  encontrado.
texts.en:
José is a man who has really struggled to get ahead in life.  Thanks to his hard work and perseverance, he managed to buy a plot of land where he wants to build his house. 

That's why he approached us seeking support for his project, which consists of purchasing construction materials to begin raising the walls of a house.

He sees in the loan, the possibility of making his dream a reality; so he is very happy to have found us.

loans.use: To start the construction of a house on his land.

loans.name: Elaine

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Elaine; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de repuestos de moto, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya no se dedica al negocio de tejido de chompas porque el negocio de venta de repestos de moto es mas rentable, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de repuestos de moto . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestos de moto al por mayor.
                                                     
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Elaine is 36, married and has three children.  Along with her daily activities, she sells motorcycle spare parts. She works from 8:00am to 7:00pm. 

She no longer has the sweater knitting business, because the motorcycle spare parts business is more profitable. She wants to expand the motorcycle spare parts business. She is applying for the loan in order to buy motorcycle spare parts at wholesale.

She is happy about getting the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts for her business.

loans.name: Maria Nela

texts.es: María Nela tiene su negocio que es una pulpería, desde hace más de 3 años que tiene esta actividad. Inicio el negocio con un dinero que ahorro con esfuerzo propio ella ha logrado ampliar su actividad y al mismo tiempo proporcionarle a sus clientes los que ellos le solicitan. El motivo del crédito es para la compra huevos, fideos, granos básicos, leche, refrescos, galletas entre otros productos.
texts.en:
María Nela has a general store business. She has had the business for more than three years.  She began it with some money that she saved. 

Through her own efforts, she has managed to expand her business, providing her customers with the products that they ask for. The purpose of the loan is to buy eggs, noodles, basic staples, milk, soft drinks, cookies and other products.

loans.use: To buy eggs, noodles, basic staples, milk, soft drinks, cookies, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair a vehicle used for work.

loans.name: María Clementina

texts.es:
María de 57 años de edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijo, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona de actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

María cuenta con su negocio de comida la misma que a colocado al frente de un banco, actividad que realiza desde hace varios años, sus clientes son las personas que trabajan en el banco y transitan por esa zona, es conocida por la limpieza y la buena sazón que tiene, con los ingresos que adquiera podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida. Su esposo es zapatero actividad con la ayuda también económicamente en su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1500 nuevos soles para implementar su negocio con la compra de más insumos, mesas y sillas para seguir brindando un buen servicio a sus clientes, ya que se han ido incrementando y con sus ganancias cubrir sus gastos familiares.  María con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado el respeto y la fidelidad de sus clientes, con la finalidad de que más adelante tenga su propio local y pueda brindarle otras oportunidad académica a su hijo.
texts.en:
María is 57 years old and lives in her own house, which has all the basic services, with her husband and child. It is located in the urban area of the district of Tambogrande which belongs to the department of Piura. The area is noted for its agriculture, livestock and crafts.

Maria has a food business which she has run for several years and which is located in front of a bank. Her customers are people who work at the bank and pass through the area. She is well-known for her cleanliness and tasty food. With the income she earns, she wlll be able to have a better quality of life. Her husband is a cobbler which also helps her financially with the household. 

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles (PEN) to consolidate her business with the purchase of more supplies, tables and chairs to continue offering her customers good service, as the number of customers has been increasing and with the income she can cover the family expenses. Maria with her hardwork and desire to succeed has earned the respect and loyalty of her customers, with the view to in the future having her own premises and offering her child other academic possibilities.

loans.use: to buy more supplies, tables and chairs in order to continue offering customers good service.

loans.name: Vidal

texts.es:
Vidal tiene 56 años, es acompañado; tiene dos hijos de cinco y seis años, respectivamente. 

Vidal trabaja como agricultor (durante la epoca de lluvia) y jornalero (durante la epoca seca, 9 meses D. año). Él se dedica a la agricultura por tradición familiar, cultivando hasta 14,000 metros cuadrados. Vidal aprendió este oficio de sus padres. Normalmente él cultiva el maíz para asegurar el alimento de su familia. Es poca la cantidad que comercializa para poder pagar por vestuario y vivienda. Para sacar su cosecha, Vidal acarrea el  maíz en su espalda y recorre aproximadamente 0.8 km.

Vidal ha pedido un préstamo a Fundación Campo para comprar una motobomba y tuberias de PVC, y así instalar un sistema de riego de tipo artesanal. Con parte D. préstamo Vidal tambien quiere comprar semillas de hortalizas para formar un huerto casero. Con el sistema de riego y el huerto Vidal podrá producir durante la epoca seca, y no depender solamente D. trabajo como jornalero. Tambien el podrá proveer legumbres para su familia y mejorar su nutrición.

Vidal es un líder en su comunidad, actualmente esta formando una cooperativa de agricultores que el preside. El objetivo de la cooperativa es organizar a los agricultores, y juntos comprar insumos, comercializar sus cosechas, y gestionar asesoría técnica. La asesoría técnica la esta recibiendo de técnicos agropecuarios por parte de una ONG. En la zona donde vive Vidal, la cual es a la orilla de un río, ningún agricultor produce otros productos aparte D. maíz y maicillo. Vidal quiere demostrarles a los demas agricultores que se puede hacer más, y así motivarlos.

Con el sistema de riego por goteo Vidal espera tener ingresos constantes que le permita dar una mejor educación y vivienda a su familia.
texts.en:
Vidal is 56 years old and he is married common-law. He has two children, aged 5 and 6 respectively.

Vida works as an agriculturist (during the rainy season) and as a farm hand (during the dry season, which is 9 months out of the year). He is an agriculturist following a family tradition, cultivating up to 14000 square meters of land. Vidal learned this business from his parents. Normally he cultivates corn to secure the family's nutrition. The amount which he sells is small to cover nutrition and clothing expenses. To sell the harvest, Vidal transports the corn on his back, traveling approximately 800 meters.

Vidal has requested a loan from Fundacion Campo (Kiva Field Partner) to purchase a pump and PVC tubing to install an artesian style irrigation system. With a part of this loan Vidal also wants to purchase vegetable seeds to start a home garden. With the irrigation system and the plantation, Vidal will be able to product even during the dry season, no longer having to depend on his work as a farm hand. He will also be able to provide vegetables for his family and improve their nutrition.

Vidal is a leader in his community. He is currently presiding over a cooperative for agriculturists. The objective of the cooperative is to organize agriculturists, to purchase materials together, to sell their harvests, and to partake in technical assistance. The technical assistance is received by agricultural technicians provided by an NGO. In the region where Vidal lives, which is alongside a river, no agriculturist products other products apart from corn and millet. Vidal wants to show the other agriculturists that more can be done, and to motivate them this way. 

With the drip irrigation system, Vidal hopes to obtain a constant source of income which will permit him to provide his family with a better education and better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a water pump and tubing to install an irrigation system.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace has successfully finished paying her first Kiva loan and now she is requesting another one. She wants to start a new retail business. With the 35,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar for her retail shop. She aspires to establish a wholesale shop in the future.

loans.use: To purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and sugar for her retail shop.

loans.name: Maria Haydee

texts.es:
María tiene 33 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Cayaltí, una zona que es conocida por la actividad agrícola y ganadera de sus pobladores. 

Desde hace unos años tiene instalado en el mercado de abastos de la ciudad de Cayaltí un puesto de venta de verduras y tuberculos. Todos los días ofrece a sus clientes una variedad de vegetales y tubérculos frescos. Este negocio es una fuente importante de ayuda para su hogar. El negocio de María siempre cuenta con clientes que prefieren su buen trato y amabilidad. 

Ella desea adquirir más verduras y tuberculos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles. Con el préstamo pude ampliar su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia con las ganancias que obtenga.
texts.en:
María is 33 and lives with her family in their own house, which has water and electricity services. It is located in the urban area of Cayaltí district, an area where people make their living farming and raising livestock.

For a few years, she has had a stand selling vegetables and potatoes set up in the produce market in the city of Cayaltí.  Every day, she offers her customers a variety of fresh vegetables and potatoes. 

This business is an important source of support for her household.  María's business always has customers who prefer her good service and friendliness.

She wants to buy more vegetables and potatoes, so she has decided to apply to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles.  With the loan she can expand her business, and improve her family's quality of life with the earnings she gets.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables and potatoes, in order to stock her business.

loans.name: Fidencio

texts.es: El apreciable Sr. Fidencio es una persona que ya tiene laborando siete  años consecutivos de técnico en un taller,  el nos solicito el préstamo a la institución ya  que  pronto  recibirá  la llegada  de  su  nieto, y  como  este  acontecimiento  genera  gastos fuertes y  en  el momento  no cuentan  con  el  capital suficiente  para   hacerle  frente, el  esta  muy contentos   de  habernos  encontrado   ya  que  gracias a  nuestro  apoyo  pagara  el  parto  de  su  nuera,  en esta  ocasión  ella no  pudo  salir  en la  fotografía  debido  a  el  horario que  tienen  en sus trabajos.
texts.en:
Fidencio is an admirable person who has been working for seven consecutive years as a technician in a workshop. 

He is asking the institution for a loan, since he expecting the arrival of a grandchild soon. This event will generate heavy expenses, and at the moment he doesn't have the funds necessary to cover them. He is very happy to have found us, as thanks to our support, he will pay for his daughter-in-law's childbirth expenses.

On this occasion, she was not able to appear in the photograph because of her schedule at work.

loans.use: To pay for childbirth expenses.

loans.name: G.s. La Colonia Group

texts.es: El Grupo solidario La colonia lo conforma Cristina, Ingrid y Luis. La señora Cristian tiene 41 años de edad, es casada con tres hijos de 7, 13 y 16 años de edad. Ella se dedica al negocio de pulpería, la tiene ubicada en su casa de habitación desde hace más de 3 años. Desea este crédito para invertirlo en granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes, papel higiénico entre otros. Ingrid del Carmen  es otra integrante del grupo. Ella tiene 25 años de edad, es  soltera y aun no tiene hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de manera ambulante, trabaja con Vogue principalmente en la distribución de productos. Ella desea invertir el crédito en la compra de cosméticos para distribuirlos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The La Colonia communal bank is comprised of Cristina, Ingrid, and Luis.

Cristina is 41 years old and married.  She has three children; ages 7, 13, and 16.  She has had a grocery store, which is located in her house, for over three years.  She wants this loan to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and toilet paper, among other things.

Ingrid del Carmen is another member of the group.  She is 25 years old, single, and does not yet have children.  She sells cosmetics in an itinerant manner.  She mainly works with Vogue in the distribution of her products.  She wants to use the loan to buy cosmetics to distribute to her customers.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia de 54 años de edad. Vive junto a su esposo e hijos en casa de sus suegros, cuenta con todos los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Chepén que pertenece al departamento de La Libertad.  Esta zona se dedica a la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Desde hace varios años, cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ofrecen en venta a los vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en general. Cuenta con una clientela establecida y no tiene otra competencia cerca de su negocio.  Con esta actividad ella solventa sus gastos económicos y ayuda  su familia.

Delia observa que va creciendo favorablemente su negocio, desea seguir ampliándolo con la compra de más mercadería como gaseosa y abarrotes en general.  Va a comprar sus productos en grandes cantidades lo que ayuda en bajar el precio que paga. Por ello, ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles. Delia es muy trabajadora, empeñosa y responsable frente a su negocio. Desea lograr mayores ingresos para brindarle mejores opciones en la vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Delia, age 54, lives with her husband and children in her in-law’s house.  The house has all of the basic services.  It is located in an urban zone in the Chepén district in the La Libertad department.  The people in this zone devote themselves to farming, livestock, and tourism.

For several years she has had a general store set up in her house.  She sells diverse daily consumption products and general groceries to her neighbors and customers.  She has established customers, and she does not have any competition close to her business.  Through this business she pays for her expenses and helps her family.

Delia notices that her business is growing favorably.  She wishes to continue expanding it with the purchase of more merchandise like soft drinks and general groceries.  She will buy products in large quantities, which will help lower the price that she pays.  

She therefore finds it advisable to request a loan for 1,200 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  Delia is a very hard-worker, and she is diligent and responsible in her business.  She wants to manage to get greater income in order to provide better options in her family’s life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise like soft drinks and general groceries for her store.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana María se dedica a la venta de cosa de horno, desde hace más de 27 años que tiene este negocio. Consiste en la elaboración de cosa de horno que ofrece de manera ambulante a pesar que no ha sido fácil pues tiene ciertas dificultades como la falta de capital de trabajo para ofrecer a sus clientes. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de maíz, leche, queso, azúcar, harina, arroz, bolsas, entre otros productos. Sueña con mejorar sus ingresos y además de esto ampliar cada día su negocio.
texts.en: Ana María has worked selling corn-based breads for more than 27 years.  She makes the bread and then sells it on the streets.  This business has not been easy for her, and she struggles with certain difficulties, like a lack of capital to make enough products to offer to her customers.  Her goal with this loan is to buy corn, milk, cheese, sugar, flour, rice, bags, and other products.  She dreams of increasing her earnings and, in addition to this, dreams of expanding her business each day.

loans.use: buy corn, milk, cheese, sugar, flour, rice, bags, and other products

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: El cliente  Mario, tiene 44 años y esta casado con la señora, Valentina, no tienen hijos dependientes, son de familia humilde y trabajadora.  El cliente se dedica al servicio de construcción, que trabaja en todos lados para sustentar a su familia, y de igual manera la  esposa se dedica al servicio de comercio de frutas, que vende en el mercado principal de la ciudad de Cochabamba (la pampa), el destino del crédito es para la construcción de su vivienda, el cliente vive en la localidad denominada Pucarita Chica, de la ciudad de Cochabamba, es por lo cual reflejamos una pequeña historia del cliente para el conocimiento de todos ustedes.
texts.en: Mario is 44 years old and married to Valentina.  They do not have any dependent children, and are a humble and hard-working family.  He works in construction all around the area in order to support his family.  His wife works selling fruit in the main market of Cochabamba.  He will use this loan to build his home.  He lives in the Pucarita Chica zone in the city of Cochabamba.  We shared a bit of his story with you all so you could get to know him.

loans.use: with the construction of his house

loans.name: William De Los Reyes

texts.es: William De Los Reyes se dedica a la venta de prodcutos veterinarios. Hace más de 7 años que tiene este negocio, a pesar de que no ha tenido una gran cantidad de clientes el siempre brinda el mejor servicio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de vitaminas, pastillas, suplementos, jarabes entre otros prodcutos, la forma de William es de manera ambulante pues tiene abordar diferentes buses para ofrecer sus prodcutos. William sueña con seguirle proporcionando mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en: William de Los Reyes sells veterinary products for a living.  He has had this business for more than seven years, and though he hasn't always had a large number of customers, he always offers the best service.  This loan will be used to buy vitamins, pills, supplements, syrups, and other products.  William's is a traveling business, as he has to take different buses to offer his products.  William dreams of continuing to make improvements to his home.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, pills, supplements, and syrups for his veterinary business.

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
Entre sartenes, harina y horno caliente  encontramos a Don Jose, un humilde panadero, originario  Madriz departamento localizado en la zona Norte de Nicaragua, pero  tiene 46 años de vivir en la ciudad de León, tiene 60 años de edad, padre de 5 hijos todo ellos independientes. El tiene 45 años de experiencia en este negocio, pues empezó desde muy joven como ayudante de panaderos, el limpiaba sartenes, acomodaba el pan ,también vendía pan después paso a elaborar con sus propias manos el pan, mezclar los diferentes tipos de harina y así fue surgiendo poco a poco hasta que un día logro poner su negocio junto con su  esposa  de panadería el cual tiene 20 años de tenerlo , ella falleció así que le toco hacerse cargo el mismo junto con sus hijos , de esta manera sobrevivió el y su familia a lo largo  de estos años. 
El solicita el crédito para comprar materia prima tales como harina, manteca, levadura, azúcar , queso y leña. Con esta inversión podrá suplir la materia prima que necesita para producir más   y  mejora sus ventas. El desea hacerle unas remodelaciones a su panadería y apoyar a  uno de sus hijos a poner su negocio de panadería.
texts.en:
Among pans, flour, and a hot oven we find Jose, a humble baker.  He is originally from the department of Madriz in the northern region of Nicaragua, but he has lived in the city of León for 46 years.  He is 60 years old and a father of five children, all of whom are independent.  He has 45 years of experience in this business as he started out as a baker's helper when he was very young cleaning pans, arranging bread, and also selling bread.  Later he went on to bake bread with his own hands, mixing different kinds of flour, and from there he progressed little by little until one day he was able to start the bakery business with his wife that he's had for 20 years.  She passed away, and so it was up to him and his children to take charge, which is how he and his family have survived throughout the years.
  
He is asking for this loan to buy raw materials, such as flour, lard, yeast, sugar, cheese, and firewood.  With this investment he will be able to supply the raw material he needs to produce more and to improve his sales.  He wants to remodel his bakery and to help one of his sons to open his own bakery business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as flour, lard, yeast, sugar, cheese, and firewood

loans.name: Daniel Natalio

texts.es: El señor Daniel vive en la zona de Villa Tunari en el Alto, el se dedica a la fabricación de sombreros de cholitas y también para señores, el vive en alquiler donde tiene un taller de sombreros de cholitas y de varones para lo cual solicito el crédito ya que necesita comprar material para la fabricación de sombreros,  necesita capital para realizar sombreros mas finos, el entrega la mercadería por docena a las tiendas sombrereras de la ciudad de La Paz, hace tiempo que se compro un terreno por la zona de San Roque el mismo que lo esta haciendo  amurallar y desea hacer construir unos cuartitos para irse a vivir en su propia casa y ya no pagar alquiler y desea dar a su familia mayor comodidad por eso trabaja duro y se esfuerza.
texts.en: Daniel lives in the Villa Tunari area of El Alto.  He makes ladies' and men's bowler hats for a living.  He lives in a rental unit where he has a workshop to make his ladies' and men's bowler hats.  That is why he asking for this loan, as he needs to buy material to make the hats and he needs capital to make nicer hats.  He turns his merchandise over by the dozen to hat shops in the city of La Paz.  A while ago he bought some land in the San Roque area.  He is building a wall around it himself and he hopes to build some small rooms so he can go live in his own home and no longer have to pay rent.  He also wants to give his family more comfort, which is why he works hard and applies himself.

loans.use: to buy material to make bowler hats

loans.name: Tamara Kruspkaya

texts.es:
Tamara es una joven de 28 años de edad, trabaja en su profesion como medico en medicina interna,  logro terminar sus estudios gracias al apoyo economico y moral de sus padres.
Hoy en dia ha venido mejorando la vivienda de su mama, para tener mejores condiciones de seguridad, en su credito anterior logro terminar su muro, teniendo avanzado bastante, con dinero propio, de su trabajo y con el financiamiento logro terminarlo a menor plazo,  ahora sera para la compra de porton grande principal el cual dara por terminado, y asi estar con mas estabilidad y seguridad, ya que hay muchos ladrones en la capital. y sus padres estaran mas cuidados. Que es muy fundamental para ella. 
Como planes a futuro es establecer su propia familia, estar estable en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Tamara is a young woman of 28 who is an internal medicine doctor.  She succeeded in completing her studies thanks to the economic and moral support from her parents.

Now she has been improving her mother’s house, to give them better security.  With her last loan she was able to finish the wall and it’s advanced quite a bit, using her own money from her work and the short term loan.  Now she will use the loan to buy a big front door which will finish the work and give her mother more stability and security since there are many burglars in the capital.  Her parents will be safer which is very fundamental for Tamara.

Her future plans are to have her own family and to have stability in her work.

loans.use: to buy an iron main door to complete the wall..

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es: La Sra. Esperanza nació en la ciudad de Potosí, actualmente radica en la localidad de San Jose, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras hace bastantes años, e casada su esposo Jesús  es albañil cuentan  con un  hijo que es menor de edad, han solicitado un crédito para la compra de  frutas ya que esta llegando la época de la manga, piña,  comprara con el dinero frutas de temporada, es cliente antigua y responsable por lo tanto nuevamente están muy agradecidos con la institucion por el apoyo económico que les ha brindado  para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Esperanza was born in the city of Potosí, and now lives in the town of San Jose.  She has sold vegetables for many years now.  She is married, her husband Jesús is a bricklayer, and they have one dependent child.  They have requested a loan to buy fruit since the season for mango and pineapple is coming up.  They will purchase seasonal fruit with the money.  She is a former client and therefore responsible.  They are again grateful to the institution for the financial support they have provided to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: buy seasonal fruit.

loans.name: Rosalia Ramona

texts.es: La Señora Rosalía tiene 36 años es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 19 años que todavía está bajo su cargo. Ella solicita este crédito para la compra 1 manzana de tierra que tiene cosecha de caña. Pues ella se dedica a sembrar caña, yuca entre otros productos. Este negocio lo inicio por la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar, pues sus padres se dedicaban a esta actividad su madre falleció y fue así que ella logro obtener este medio de vida.
texts.en: Señora Rosalia is 36 years old. She is married and has one son, who is 19 and whom she still supports. She is applying for this loan to purchase 1 mz. of land (about 1.7 acres) which has a crop of sugar cane. Then she will plant cane and yucca, among other crops. She began this business because of the need to pay household expenses, since her parents did this kind of work. Her mother has died, but this was how Rosalia learned this way of making a living.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Aquiles

texts.es:
El señor Aquiles tiene 46 años de edad, vive en el barrio el Reparto de la ciudad capital y se dedica a prestar los servicios de transporte, posee un Taxi, tiene mas de cuatro años de experiencia con este tipo de negocio, su unidad esta asignada en un Centro Comercial de la ciudad, el cual es visitado diariamente por miles de personas y que son los que le solicitan el servicio, el credito lo utilizara para pintar su unidad ya que la pintura esta en mal estado y la entidad estatal de transportes les obliga a que las unidades esten bien pintadas.
gracias a este negocio puede sostener a su esposa e hijos y cumplir con las obligaciones adquiridas.
texts.en:
Aquiles is 46 years old, lives in the Reparto neighborhood of the capital, and offers transportation services for a living.  He has a taxi and more than four years of experience in this kind of business.  His taxi is assigned to the city's commercial center, which is visited daily by thousands of people who are among those who use his services.  He will use the loan to paint his taxi since the paint is in bad shape and the state transportation authority requires taxis' paint to be in good condition.  

Thanks to this business, he can support his wife and children and fulfill the obligations he has acquired.

loans.use: to buy materials and paint for his vehicle

loans.name: Lester Roberto

texts.es: El Señor Lester tiene 1hijo el se dedica a la distribución de productos pepsi,  hace 4 años, comenzó con pocos productos pues él le compra a los camiones distribuidoras ya que el almacena sus productos y los distribuye a las pulperías. El crédito solicitado es para comprar variedad en gaseosas de diferentes sabores y tamaños. El Sueño del Señor Lester es mejorar su negocio y ampliarlo cada día más.
texts.en: Lester has one child and he has been distributing Pepsi products for the past 4 years.  He started with a few items but then he started buying from the company trucks.  Now he warehouses the products and distributes them to the general stores.  He is requesting a loan to buy different types of soft drinks, and different flavors and sizes.   Lester’s dream is to improve his business and expand it more every day.

loans.use: to buy a variety of soft drinks in different flavors and sizes

loans.name: Rene Omar

texts.es:
En Subtiava un barrio muy pintoresco y conocido en la ciudad de León, habita el  señor René , un comerciante , dueño de molinos, tiene 54 años de edad,  casado, tiene 3 hijos de 23,22 y 17 años de edad, el mayor de sus hijos es ingeniero en telemática los otros dos aun están estudiando. Este negocio ha sido traspasado de generación en generación, sus padres y abuelos eran quienes se hacia cargo de este negocio. Pero el tiene aproximadamente 23 años de tenerlo por cuenta propia. 
El solicita el préstamo para acondicionar y hacerle reparaciones a su local, mantenimiento a su molinos  donde tiene su molino, e invertir en compra de granos básicos .Esto le ayudara a dar una mejor presentación a su negocio y dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Uno de sus planes futuros es expandirse, poner otros molinos en lugares diferentes de la ciudad de León, su meta próxima es ayudar a sus dos hijos menores a finalizar sus estudios profesionales.
texts.en:
René lives in Subtiava, a very picturesque and well-known neighborhood in the city of León.  He is a business man who owns mills.  He is 54 years old, married, and has three children who are 23, 22, and 17 years old.  His oldest son is a telematics engineer; the other two are still in school.  This business has been passed down from generation to generation; his parents and grandparents were the ones who were in charge of this business.  However, he has run it on his own for approximately 23 years.

He is asking for the loan to equip and repair his business, to maintain his mills on site and to invest in the purchase of staple grains.  This will help him give his business a better appearance and provide better service to his customers.  One of his future plans is to expand by setting up more mills in different areas of the city of León.  His next goal is to help his two youngest children finish their professional studies.

loans.use: to equip and repair his business, to maintain his mills on site and to invest in the purchase of staple grains

loans.name: Ruth Belina

texts.es:
Doña Ruth, sigue al frente de su negocio, cada dia, en donde ofrece ricos platillos de comidas, asi como alquilando dos cuartos, lo que le ayudado economicamente en sus ingresos, hoy en dia a un  apoya a dos de sus dos hijos menores que junto a su esposo le bridamos educacion, el sigue laborando siempre de conductor, pues lleva años ejerciendo este trabajo.
Con este nuevo prestamo, podra terminar la construccion de dos baños con inodoros, e instalar las aguas negras, ya que tiene parte de las paredes construida, pero necesita darle mejor acondicionamiento, de seguridad para una buena higiene, para sus inquilinos, como en lo personal. 
Materiales a comprar bloques, hierro, cemento, inodoro, tubos para agua negras, pegamento, entre otros productos que ayude a su obra.
Pues esta muy contenta al poder realizar estas mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Doña Ruth continues to be in charge of her business, in which she offers delicious meals every day, as well as renting two rooms, which helps her income. With this income she supports her two younger children. She and her husband are offering them an education. Her husband continues to work, as always, as a driver, since he has been doing this work for years.

With this new loan, she will be able to finish the construction of two bathrooms with toilets and install a sewage system, since she has part of the walls already built, but she needs to do a better job, for security and for good hygiene, for her tenants as well as for her family. 

She will buy materials such as concrete blocks, iron, cement, toilets, pipes for wastewater, and glue, among other products that will help this effort. She is very happy to be able to make these improvements in her home.

loans.use: to finish constructing the bathrooms, install toilets and pipes for wastewater, and finish the roof and a concrete wall for the whole project

loans.name: Jose Dagoberto

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 46 años de edad, vive en la colonia Vista Hermosa y se dedica a la venta de repuestos y accesorios para vehiculos como ser parabrisas, parlantes, gatas, tapasoles, alfombras, radios entre otros, cuenta con varios años de tener su negocio, sus ventas las realiza de Lunes a sábado en una calle muy transitada de la ciudad, la mayoría de sus clientes son los motoristas y dueños de taxis, todas las mañanas junto con su hermano exponen sus productos en el vehículo para que todas las personas que transitan por el lugar puedan observar la variedad de accesorios y repuestos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de accesorios y repuestos para diferentes marcas de carros.
gracias a las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio puede cubrir los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
José is 46 years old and lives in the neighborhood of Vista Hermosa. He works selling car parts and accessories such as windshields, speakers, jacks, sun shades, mats, radios, and more. He has had his business for several years. He sells his merchandise from Monday to Saturday on a very busy street in the city. The majority of his customers are taxi drivers. Every morning, he and his brother display their wares in a vehicle so that everyone who travels by can see the variety of accessories and car parts.

He will use the loan to buy car parts and accessories for different makes of cars. Thanks to the income from his business, he can provide for his family's expenses.

loans.use: buy car parts and accessories

loans.name: Maria Santos

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y cuatro hijos.

Ella se dedica desde hace seis años a la venta de comida rápida como papitas fritas, hot dog, entre otros. Esta actividad la ejerce junto a su compañero de vida, y la aprendió gracias a su mamá. Ella debe trasladarse a unas ciudades del oriente del país, para comprar los insumos que necesita, aborda un autobús durante seis kilómetros, luego llega al puesto que tiene en el centro de la comunidad y empieza a prepararlos, por lo que debe levantarse muy de mañana y los vende de lunes a domingo.

Maria esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar: pan, carne de pollo y de res, verduras, salsas, papas, mayonesa, queso, etc. Con esto ella podrá tener variedad de productos y satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, que es mucha y no da abasto, ya que es el único puesto que vende los productos que ella elabora. Por lo que tiene un gran mercado, de esta forma recibirá mejores ingresos, lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y brindarles educación a sus hijos y salud. Ella desea que sus hijos sean profesionales, y tener una vivienda digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 30 years old and she live with her life partner and their four children. For the past six years she has been selling fast foods such as French fries, hot dogs, etc. He carries out this activity together with her life partner, and she learned the business from her mother. She needs to travel to cities in the west of the country to purchase ingredients that she needs. She boards a bus for six kilometers and later returns to the stand that she has in the community's center and she starts to prepare them. She needs to start her days very early in the morning, and she's open for business from Monday to Sunday.

Maria requests a loan to from Fundacion Campo (Kiva Field Partner) to purchase: bread, chicken and beef meats, vegetables, salsas, potatoes, mayonnaise, cheese, etc. This way she will be able to have a variety of products and to satisfy the demand of her clients. The demand is high and she is not able to respond, especially because it is the only stand that sells the products that she makes. It is the reason why she has such a large market and this is how she will have an improve income. It will permit her to improve the quality of her life and she will be able to provide her children with an education and with health care. She wants for her children to have a career, and to have a dignified home for their families.

loans.use: to purchase larger quantities fo bread, chicken and beef meats, vegetables, mayonnaise, and other ingredients to make French fries and hot dogs.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
La señora María es socia del banco comunal "Mujeres Triunfadoras" del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y tiene un hijo.
Recién lleva tres ciclos  trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos.  Ella se dedica a la comercialización de pescado, los lleva a vender por la carretera junto a su esposo, él maneja su furgón que compraron especialmente para este negocio que es ir a distintas partes llevando a vender el pescado.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevo soles comprará:5 tinas de pescado bagre, 2 tinas de bocachico,1 tina de sardinas, 1 bandeja de lisa. 
Su movilidad no tiene más capacidad, pero es regular lo que pueden transportar, solo tiene pena cuando deja a su hijo para salir a trabajar.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad de ser parte de su familia..
texts.en:
María is a member of the "Mujeres Triunfadoras" (Triumphant Women) Communal Bank in the district of Calleria, department of Ucayali. She is 29 years old, married, and has one son. She has recently completed three loan cycles working with loans from Manuela Ramos. She works selling fish along the highway with her husband. He drives the van that they bought especially for this business, going to different locations transporting fish to sell.

With her new loan of 1,000.00 nuevo soles, she will buy 5 tubs of catfish, 2 tubs of bocachico fish, 1 tub of sardines, and 1 tray of grey mullet. Her van does not have room for more than that, but that is the normal amount they can transport. The only thing she regrets is leaving her son when she goes to work. She is thankful for the opportunity to be a member of the Manuela Ramos family.

loans.use: buy fish in bulk

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Maria Cristina, de 43 años de edad, habitante de la cuidad de León, madre de 4 hijos, todos ellos independientes, ella es maestra de profesión pero al mismo tiempo es comerciante, ella tiene una mini- tienda de ropa.
