Ella trabajo 12 años como maestra de una escuela primaria pero al renunciar busco otra manera de cómo ganarse el pan de cada día de manera honrada así que con el dinero que le dieron de su liquidación puso su tienda de ropa  usada para vender.  

Ella solicita el préstamo para hacerles mejoras y reparaciones a su casa y darle una mejor presentación a su tienda para poder atraer clientes, hacerles sentir confort en su tienda e invertir en mercadería nueva para vender. Le gustaría dar publicidad radial para darse a conocer mas en todo su vecindario y en lo futuro poner dos tiendas de ropa usada.
texts.en:
Señora Maria Cristina is 43 years old and a resident of the city of Leon. She has 4 children, all independent. She is a teacher by profession but is also a merchant. She has mini-store selling clothes. She worked for 12 years as a primary school teacher but on resigning looked for another way to earn her daily bread in an honest way. With her severance pay, she set up a used-clothes shop. 

She is asking for a loan to make improvements and repairs to her house and give her shop a better appearance to attract customers, make them feel comfortable in her shop and also to invest in new merchandise to sell. She would like to subscribe to radio advertising to be better known around the neighbourhood and in the future set up 2 used-clothes stores.

loans.use: to make improvements and repairs to her house to give her shop a better appearance so as to attract customers and make them feel comfortable in her shop and invest in new merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Hildaura

texts.es:
La señora Hildaura es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 53 años de edad y es soltera.
Lleva 10 años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, cuenta con un puesto en uno de los mercados de la ciudad.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,300.00 nuevos soles comprará: 10 paquetes de gaseosas de diferentes tamaños y sabores, 1 paquete de sorbetes, 1 ciento de vasos.
A sus años todavía está soltera y sin compromiso, su único compromiso lo tiene con su hermano que es un minusválido a quien atiende antes de ir a trabajar, espera seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos para ir implementando más su negocio.
Su trabajo es casi  de todo el día, regresa por las noches  para poder descansar y ver cómo se encuentra su hermano, como buena hermana se preocupa que nada le falte.
texts.en:
Señora Hildaura is a member of the communal bank Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 53 years old and single. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for 10 years. She sells soft drinks from a stall located at one of the city's markets.

With the new loan of S/. 1,300.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy: 10 cases of soft drinks of different sizes and flavours, 1 case of sherbet, 100 glasses. 

At her age, she is still single and without responsibility. Her sole responsibilty is her brother who is disabled. She attends to him before she goes to work. She looks forward to working with Manuela Ramos so as to continue consolidating her business more.

She works nearly all day and goes home at night to rest and see how her brother is doing, as being a caring sister she worries that he lacks for nothing.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks.

loans.name: Lizett

texts.es:
La señora Lizett es socia del banco comunal Las divinas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos menores.
Lleva cuatro años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir, cuenta con cuatro máquinas que utiliza para realizar trabajos de confección, también trabaja sobre pedidos. 
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: 14 metros de tela, 7 kilos de tela de algodón, 2 conos de elásticos de 10 ligas, 50 metros de blonda blanca, 50 metros de pasa cinta, 3 conos de hilos.
En su negocio también genera trabajo para otras personas, sobre todo cuando tiene pedidos por cantidad, su esposo es trabajador  independiente, tiene un moto car propio que le sirve para mantener a su familia, gracias a Manuela Ramos tiene un negocio propio y lo mejor es que funciona en su misma casa.
texts.en:
Señora Lizett is a member of the communal bank Las Divinas del Distrito Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is 53 years old, married and has 2 dependent children. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for 4 years. She works making clothing. She has 4 machines used for manufacturing jobs and she also works to order. 

With her new loan of S/. 2,200.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy: 14 metres of fabric, 7 kilos of cotton cloth, 2 bobbins of elastic of 10 ligas (10 leagues), 50 metres of white lace, 50 metres of ribbon, 3 bobbins of thread.

She also generates work for other people with her own business, expecially when she has large orders. Her husband is self employed. He has his own motor tricycle which he uses to support his family. Thanks to Manuela Ramos she has her own business and the best thing is that it is located in her own home.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, cotton, elastic.

loans.name: Saul Alexander

texts.es:
Saúl tiene 19 años de edad, es soltero y vive con sus padres. A raíz de las limitantes económicas de sus padres, él no tuvo la oportunidad de seguir estudiando quedándose nada mas con un nivel educativo básico. Tiene 2 hermanos  uno mayor y otro menor.  Su padre es propietario de un taller de estructuras metálicas y su madre es ama de casa. Este joven emprendedor trabajó con su padre en el taller y se relacionaba con muchas personas y vio la oportunidad de independizarse poniendo su propio negocio “LAVADO DE VEHICULO” debido a la cantidad de vehículos que circulan a diario por la zona, esta actividad la inicio desde hace  3 años y  el local donde está el establecimiento es de su papa.
El negocio lo inicio con fondos propios y por primera vez está teniendo la experiencia de solicitar un préstamo.  El crédito será utilizado para la compra de accesoria para vehículos (aceites, aromatizantes,etc) y también para reparar la máquina de lavado a vapor. El negocio es manejado por él y su hermano, las actividades las inician a las 6.00 de la mañana y la finalizan a las 6 de la tarde; la ubicación del negocio está apropiada ya que se encuentra sobre la carretera litoral y el flujo de vehículos es muy bueno y en la zona solo hay otro CAR WASH.  La proyección de Saúl es atender mayor número de clientes y brindar un servicio complementario como es la venta de accesorios, resulta que actualmente las personas solo llegan a lavar su vehículo y se van al otro negocio (competencia) a comprar sus accesorios y la otra limitante que tiene es que solo lava carrocerías,  ya que por no tener la lavadora a vapor no puede lavar motores y eso le resta ingresos.  
Los planes para el futuro de saul son: Fortalecer su negocio con mayor equipo  y  ampliar el servicio a un taller de reparación de vehículos, también irse preparando económicamente  y comprar  sus electrodomésticos  para casarse y vivir dignamente. Finalmente  tiene su sueño a largo plazo de su casa y formar una familia de éxito en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Saul Alexander is 19 years old, single, and he lives with his parents. Given his parents' limited financial resources he was not able to stay in school. He only has a basic level of education. He has two brothers, and older and a younger. His father is the owner of a blacksmith shop and his mother is a housewife. This young entrepreneur started out working with his father in the shop and he got to know many people when he saw the opportunity to set up his own car wash business, given the number of vehicles that passed daily through the region. He started out this business 3 years ago and space where his business is established belongs to his father.

He started out his business with his own funds and for the first time he is requesting a loan. The loan will be used to purchase vehicle accessories (oils, car fresheners, etc.) and to repair his steam cleaning machine. The business is managed by himself and by his brother. They open their business at 6:00 in the morning and the finish at 6:00 in the evening. The location of the business is appropriate because it is found on a coastal road and the flux of vehicles is very good. There is only one other car wash in the region. Young Saul's goal is to attend to a larger number of clients and to provide complementary services such as the sale of accessories. Currently people only come to wash their car and they go to the other business (the competition) to buy their accessories. The other limiting factor is that he can only do the body wash. He doesn't have a steam cleaner so he cannot wash the motors and this represents is a loss of income.

His plans for the future for this young entrepreneur are to: strengthen his business with better tools and to expand his service to include a vehicle repair shop. He also wants to start preparing himself financially and to buy home appliances to get married and to live in a dignified way. Finally, his long-term dream is to have a house and to form a successful family in his society.

loans.use: to purchase car accessories such as oils and air fresheners and to purchase a steam cleaning machine.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: Rosa Emilia tiene 31 años, es una mujer amable y muy talentosa, convive con su pareja, Ella trabaja en una pulpería en donde ofrece una gran variedad de productos como huevos, leche, carnes, pollos, cremas, golosinas, granos básicos, detergentes, fósforos y otros. es por eso que solicita el credito para la compra de materia prima, lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que dispone de tiempo, es independiente y no tiene que rendir cuentas a nadie, ella es muy responsables, está muy agradecida pues los préstamos recibidos anteriormente le fueron de mucha ayuda y fueron muy bien invertido, espera contar nuevamente con su ayuda.
texts.en: Rosa Emilia is 31 years old and is a friendly and talented woman who lives with her partner. She works in a grocery store where she offers a wide variety of products such as eggs, milk, meat, chicken, creams, sweets, dry grains, detergents, matches and more. This is why she is asking for a loan to buy the raw materials for her business. What she likes about her work is that she has time, is independent and is not accountable to anyone. She is very responsible and is very grateful as the previous loans she received were of great help and were well invested. She hopes to have your support again.

loans.use: to buy eggs, milk, meat, chicken, creams, sweets, dry grains, detergents, matches and more.

loans.name: Rosini

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Rosini; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia sigue con sus negocios de venta de helados y venta de repuestos de carros y tractor,ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,el negocio de venta de helados y venta de repuestos lo realiza en el distrito de Anta,la socia quiere ampliar y seguir mejorando en su negocio de venta de repuestos de carro y venta de helados . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar repuestosb al por mayor y comprar insumos para preparar los helados como frutas.
                                                      
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosini is 40 years old and lives with a partner. She has 3 chilldren. The member continues with her business of selling ice cream and selling spare parts for cars and tractors from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. Both the ice cream business and the spare parts business are based in the district of Anta. The member wants to expand and continue improving her car spare parts business and her ice cream business. The member is asking for a loan to buy spare parts wholesale and supplies such as fruit to make her ice cream. 

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with her repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy spare parts wholesale and buy supplies such as fruit to make ice cream.

loans.name: Hilda's Group

texts.es:
Hilda's Group está conformado por tres personas: 2 mujeres y un hombre. En este grupo Hilda es la presidenta. 

Hilda tiene 45 años vive con su hijo en La Esperanza que se encuentra a 15 minutos de Ibarra en el Norte de Ecuador. Se considera una persona trabajadora y responsable de su hijo.

Trabaja con sus sobrinas en el bordado de manteles. Es el segundo crédito que solicita a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de materia prima como manteles, tela, hilo para bordar, lo que va a ayudar a incrementar su producción para mejorar sus ventas e ingresos. Su sueño es que su hijo sea profesional y en lo personal quiere ser una inversionista grande para poder emplear a personal.
texts.en:
Hilda's Group has three members: two women and one man.  Hilda is the group's president.

Hilda is 45 years old and lives with her son in La Esperanza, 15 minutes from Ibarra, in the north of Ecuador.  She considers herself to be a hard-working person and is responsible for her son.

Hilda works with her nieces, embroidering tablecloths.  This is the second loan she has requested from Fodemi.  She will invest it in buying raw materials such as tablecloths, fabric and embroidery thread, which will help her to increase her production so that she can improve her sales and income.  Her dream is for her son to become a professional and, on a personal level, she would like to become a big investor so that she can employ some staff.

loans.use: to buy fabric and embroidery thread

loans.name: Diamoral Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le07 JUIN 2001. Il  est  constitué de dix. femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Madame Fatou Bintou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 33 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge six autres enfants confiés par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente de fruits et légumes.. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (scolarité etc.…)
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 7, 2001. It consists of ten women who live in the same neighborhood. Their main activity is trade.

Mrs. Fatou Bintou is the head of the group. She is standing at the far right in the photo, with her hand raised. She is 33 years old and married with two children, and she also has six other children entrusted to her by relatives.

She sells fruits and vegetables. She has a good command of this activity in which she has several years of experience. 

She will use this loan to strengthen her capital and better expand her activities.

The profits will enable her to improve her family’s living conditions (education, etc.).

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Encarna

texts.es:
La señora Encarna es socia del banco comunal Las Divinas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 65 años de edad, está casada y tiene seis hijos mayores de edad,  solo un hijo (soltero) vive con ellos.
Viene trabajando siete años con Manuela Ramos, tiene una pequeña bodega que funciona en su misma casa, que cuando ella sale a realizar sus comparas su esposo queda encargado del negocio, y lo reemplaza muy bien, es amable con sus clientes.
Con su nuevo préstamo  de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprara: 3 tiras de champú, 6 tiras de papitas fritas, 2 tiras de chizitos, 2 tiras de boliqueso, 1 caja de galletas soda, 1 docena de ayudin pequeño, 1 caja de leche chica. 
Tiene la suerte de contar con la ayuda de su esposo y de su hijo que son las personas que están ahí cuando lo necesita, agradece a Manuela Ramos por todo los prestamos que le han dado en todo este tiempo para poner su negocio.
texts.en:
Encarna is a member of the 'Las Divinas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 65 years old, married, and has six children who are all grown up.  Only one son (who is single) still lives with her.

Encarna has been working with Manuela Ramos for seven years and has a small grocery store in her own home.  When she goes out to do her shopping, her husband looks after the business and he replaces her very well as he is friendly to her customers.

Encarna will use her new loan for 1,000 soles to buy three strips of shampoo, three strips of potato chips, two strips of Chizitos, two strips of Boliqueso, 1 box of soda crackers, 1 dozen small tubs of Ayudín (cleaning products) and 1 box of small cans of milk.

Encarna is lucky to have the help of her husband and her son, who are the people who are there when she needs them.  She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the loans that they have given her over all these years so that she can run her business.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, snacks, candies, detergents and milk

loans.name: Esperanza Imelda

texts.es:
Doña Esperanza de oficio conserje con mas de seis años, laborando en la misma empresa, tambien tiene su pequeño negocio de tortilla, en casa, quien lo ve un familiar, y que ambas se apoyan ya que ella le da, donde vivir, y asi no depender solo de su salario, ya que como objetivo es hacer las mejoras  a su casa. y es madre soltera.
Esperanza con el credito anterior,iva hacer la construccion de un muro, pero decidio comenzar un cuarto, para poder tener mas espacio, lo que abanzo bastante, y que con este otro financiamiento podra seguir levantando paredes, poner techo, y puertas, si le alcanza, lo que para ella es de gran sastifaccion poder culminar esta obra. 
Hoy en dia, esta dando educacion a su hijo menor, el cual esta en el ultino año de secundaria. Como planes es poder dar una carrera universitaria, a su hijo, asi como poner una venta en su casa, a corto plazo, ya que hay dia, muy cansado en su trabajo, la viajadera en las rutas de tarde. Y que espera contar siempre con Afodenic, para seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Esperanza has been working as a janitor for more than six years, for the same company.  She also has a small business making tortillas at home which a family member looks after.  They both support each other.  Esperanza gives her somewhere to live and, in turn, she doesn't have to depend on her salary alone.  Her goal is to make improvements to her home.  Esperanza is a single mother.

Esperanza was going to use her previous loan to build a wall but she decided to start building a room so that she could have more space.  She made a lot of progress and she will use this new loan to continue building the walls, adding a roof and also doors if the money stretches far enough.  She will be very happy to complete this work.

Esperanza is currently providing her youngest son with an education.  He is in his last year of high school.  She plans to be able to send him to university and also plans, in the short term, to set up a store in her home, as there are days when she comes home very tired from work because the trip home is very long.  She hopes that she will always be able to count on Afodenic, so that she can continue growing.

loans.use: to finish building some walls, a roof and a door so that she can complete another room which will give her more space and privacy

loans.name: Lisia Milagros

texts.es:
La señora Lisia es socia del banco comunal Las Divina del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y tiene 1 hijo.
Lleva siete años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de ropa, las vende en los caseríos cercanos a su casa.
Con su nuevo prestamos de S/ 1,300.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 ½ docena de pantalones, 1 ½ de polos para varones, 6 camisas, 6 bivirís, 6 shores de tela.
Cada fin de mes tiene que venir a Pucallpa (Ciudad) para hacer sus compras, también atiende pedidos. Su esposo es docente de profesión y los dos trabajan y están ahorrando para la educación de su hijo y cualquier emergencia que se pudiera presentar.
Espera seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos, es puntual con sus pagos para que a fin de ciclo también pueda recibir los incentivos que dan a las socias puntuales.
texts.en:
Lisia is a member of the 'Las Divinas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 34 years old, married, and has one child.

Lisia has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for seven years.  Her business is selling clothes.  She makes her sales in the small villages near her home.  She will use her new loan for 1,300 soles to buy 1 ½ dozen pairs of pants (trousers), 1 ½ dozen men's polo shirts, 6 shirts, 6 undershirts and 6 pairs of shorts.

At the end of every month, Lisia has to go to the city of Pucallpa to make her purchases.  She also fills any orders.  Her husband is a teacher by profession.  The pair of them both work and are saving up so that they can pay for their son's education and cover any emergency that might present itself.

Lisia hopes to continue working with Manuela Ramos.  She is punctual in making her repayments so that, at the end of each loan cycle, she is able to receive the incentives that Manuela Ramos provide to members who make their payments on time.

loans.use: to buy clothes (tops, pants, shirts, etc).

loans.name: Karambenor Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 07 JUIN 2001. Il  est  constitué de neuf femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Madame Aminata qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 73 ans. Elle est veuve. Elle a la charge quatre enfants confiés par ses parents.

Elle s’active dans la vente d'huile de palme et de jus de citron. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu'elle pratique depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  son petit commerce d'huile de palme et de jus de citron

Les profits lui permettront de subvenir à ses besoins personnels et d’améliorer les conditions de vie des enfants qui lui sont confiés ( nourriture etc.…).
texts.en:
This community bank was created on the 7th of June 2001.  The group is made up of nine women who live in the same neighborhood.  Their main business activity is buying and selling goods.

Aminata, who is on the right of the photo raising her hand, is the group's leader.  She is 73 years old and a widow.  She has four children in her care who have been entrusted to her by their parents.

Aminata's business is selling palm oil and lemon juice.  She has good experience in this field which she has been working in for several years.

This loan will allow Aminata to strengthen her capital and better develop her small business selling palm oil and lemon juice.

The profits that Aminata makes will allow her to cover her personal needs and improve the living conditions of the children that she is responsible for (food, etc.)

loans.use: to buy palm oil and lemon juice

loans.name: Lila Yadira

texts.es: Lila, tiene 43 años de edad, habita en Subtiava uno de los barrios mas populares y pintorescos de la ciudad de León, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 20 años de edad , el primero esta en su ultimo año de la secundaria y el segundo lleva segundo año de la carrera de Ingeniería Industrial . Ella es comerciante, dueña de uno de los molinos mas populares de su vecindario, anteriormente se dedicaba a dar clases a niños de primaria. El negocio de molinos lo heredo de su familia, de hecho ahora son dos molinos que ella tiene en diferentes puntos de su vecindario, su esposo aporta en el hogar con lo que gana y además le ayuda a administrar el negocio de molinos. Una dela necesidades delas cuales ella carece es de la infraestructura donde tiene sus molinos no son las adecuadas, es por ello que solicita el préstamo para hacer mejoras, pintarlo y hacer reparaciones a su local donde tiene los molinos. Pues esto le ayudara a brindar un mejor servicio y apariencia a su negocio. Por lo pronto quiere abrir otro local de molinos populares, ayudar a su vecindario brindando este servicio, y sacar adelante su mayor orgullo sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lila is 43 years old and lives in Subtiava, one of the most popular neighborhoods in the city of León which is full of local color.   She is married and has two children aged 17 and 20.  The first is in his last year of high school and the second is in his second year of a degree in Industrial Engeineering.  Lila owns one of the most popular mills in her neighborhood.  She used to give classes to elementary school children.  Lila inherited her mill business from her family.  She now has two mills in different locations within her neighborhood.  Her husband contributes to the household with what he earns and also helps her to run her mill business.

One of the difficulties that Lila has is that the infrastructure of the place where she has her mills is not suitable.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to make some improvements, to paint and to make some repairs to her premises.  This will help her to provide a better service and give her business a better appearance.  She would soon like to open another location with a mill, helping her neighborhood by providing this service, and supporting her biggest pride and joy (her children).

loans.use: to make improvements, to paint and to make some repairs to the premises where she has her mills

loans.name: Diris Carolina

texts.es:
La señora Diris tiene 35 años de edad, vive en la residencial Panchita y se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, ropa interior y ropa para dama. sus ventas son de lunes a sábado, sus clientes son sus vecinos y personas que trabajan en diferentes empresas privadas, sus ventas son al credito.
Diris desea tener un negocio grande y surtido en el futuro, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de productos de uso personal, detro de poco comienza la epoca de navidad y desea estar preparada con una variedad de productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos del hogar y para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Diris is 35 years old and lives in Panchita neighborhood.  Her business is selling personal care products, underwear and women's clothing.  She makes her sales from Monday to Saturday.  Her customers are her neighbors and people who work in different private companies.  She makes her sales on credit.

Diris would like to have a large, well-stocked business in the future.  She will use her loan to buy personal care products.  The Christmas season will begin soon and she would like to be prepared, with a range of products to offer her customers.  She needs the profits to cover her household expenses and to provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy creams, deodorants, shampoo, hair conditioner, underwear and blouses

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora María es socia del banco comunal las Divinas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 59 años de edad, está separada y tiene 5 hijos.
Lleva ocho años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, ella tiene un taller de costura,cuenta con algunas máquinas necesarias para dar un buen acabado a las prendas.
Su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles lo invertirá de la siguiente manera: s/ 250.00 soles en hacer el piso de su taller, con lo demás comprará insumos como 10 cortes de tela, 1 ciento de botones de diferentes tamaños y colores.
Con su trabajo ha podido educar a sus dos hijos mayores que ya son profesionales, solo tiene tres a su cargo, tiene el apoyo económico de sus dos hijos.
Agradece a Dios por haberle dado unos  hijos que saben valorar el esfuerzo que hizo su madre para educarlos, ahora le están retribuyendo.
texts.en:
María is a member of the "Las Divinas" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 59 years old, separated, and has five children.

María has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for eight years.  She has a sewing workshop and has some machines which are necessary for giving her garments a good finish.

María will invest her new loan for 2,500 soles in the following way: she will spend 250 soles on laying flooring in her workshop and use the rest to buy supplies such as 10 lengths of fabric and 100 buttons in different shapes and colors.

Through her work, María has been able to educate her two eldest children who are now professionals.  She only has three children still in her care.  She has the financial support of her two eldest children.

María thanks God for having given her children who know to value the efforts that their mother made to educate them and are now repaying her.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
Luz tiene 23 años, es casada y tiene un hijo de tres años; vive con su familia en Salcedo que se encuentra ubicado a 20 minutos de Latacunga en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador. Luz se considera una persona buena, tranquila, sociable y amable.

Trabaja con su esposo en la crianza de cerdos. Es la primera vez que solicita crédito a Fodemi, este crédito invertirá en la compra de balanceado para la alimentación de sus cerdos lo que ayudará a que crezcan sanos y gordos para que esten de buena calidad al momento de la venta, ya que obtendrán buenos ingresos.

Su sueño es que su hijo crezca sano y necesita tener una casa propia.
texts.en:
Luz is 23 years old, married, and has a 3-year-old son.  She lives with her family in Salcedo, 20 minutes from Latacunga, in Sierra Centro region, in Ecuador.  Luz considers herself to be a good, calm, sociable and kind person.

Luz works with her husband, raising pigs.  This is the first time that she has requested a loan from Fodemi.  She will invest this loan in buying nutritionally-balanced feed for her pigs.  This will help them to grow healthy and fat so that they are good quality when she comes to sell them.  This will make her good income.

Luz's dream is for her son to grow up healthy and to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for her pigs

loans.name: Misael Anani

texts.es:
Don Misael tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos.

Él se dedica a la albañilería ya tiene treinta años de experiencia, empezó como ayudante de un albañil, y hoy en día él tiene mucho conocimiento en la actividad que realiza. Al mismo tiempo le esta enseñando a sus hijos este oficio para que puedan defenderse en la vida.

Don Misael esta solicitando un préstamo  a Fundación Campo, para instalar la energía eléctrica en su casa, ya que nunca la han tenido de forma propia, al tenerla él junto con su esposa pretenden poner una pequeña tienda, ya que su esposa se dedica a la venta de tortillas y le seria de mucha ayuda el tener energía en su casa. De esta manera mejoran su condición de vida, él en un futuro desea ampliar su casa y construirla de ladrillo, ya que actualmente es de lámina, pero con la ayuda del préstamo y su familia dice don Misael que lo pueden lograr.
texts.en:
Misael is 46 years old, lives with his life partner and their three children.

He makes a living as a mason and already has thirty years of experience. He began as an assistant to a mason and now has extensive knowledge about his livelihood. At the same time, he is teaching his children this trade so that they can fend for themselves in life.

Misael is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo in order to install electricity in their home, as they have never had their own means to do so.  Once they get electricity, he intends to start a small shop together with his wife. His wife already makes a living selling tortillas and it would be a great help to have energy in the house. In this way, they will improve their living conditions. In the future he wants to expand his house and construct it with brick, as currently it is made of sheet metal. With the help of the loan and his family Misael says that they will be able to achieve this.

loans.use: to install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Mari Luz

texts.es:
MARI LUZ
La señora Mari, es socia del banco comunal Las Divinas. Distrito Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 46 años de edad, sola, tres hijos.
Cuenta con un taller de carpintería, tiene a su cargo un maestro carpintero, un ayudante que elaboran los muebles que lo venden en blanco.
Con su nuevo préstamo de   S/.1,700.00 nuevos soles comprara: 6 tablones de madera cedro, 10 tablones de madera capirona, 2 kilos de cola, 2 kilos de clavos.
Para mantener esta carpintería a flote tiene que salir a buscar sus clientes, y también se encarga personalmente en la compra de las maderas  y la supervisión del armado de los mueble, el taller lo tiene en el interior de su casa por el espacio que necesita para este trabajo.
Espera que Manuela Ramos sigua apoyando a las mujeres trabajadoras, que tiene que mantener a su familia solas.
texts.en:
Mari is a member of the "Las Divinas" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 46 years old, single, and has three children.

Mari owns a carpentry workshop and has a master carpenter and an assistant working for her who make the furniture which they sell.

Mari will use her new loan for 1,700 soles to buy 6 planks of cedar wood, 10 planks of capirona wood (capirona is a native hardwood tree), 2 kilos of glue and 2 kilos of nails.

In order to keep her carpentry workshop running, Mari has to go out and find customers.  She also personally takes care of buying the wood and supervising the assembly of the pieces of furniture.  Her workshop is located inside her home owing to the space that is needed for this work.

Mari hopes that Manuela Ramos will continue supporting hard-working women who have to provide for their families on their own.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Nely Aracely

texts.es:
La señora Nely tiene 45 años de edad, vive en el Barrio Victoria y se dedica a la venta de golosinas y refrescos, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion, ahi prepara ricas golosinas como ser tacos, enchiladas, tajaditas de platano con carne, carne asada, burritas de carne, pollo frito etc.
Nely vive con su esposo y una hija, Nely es una mujer muy seria, no sonríe mucho pero si tiene carácter amigable y se caracteriza por ser responsable en sus compromisos, la meta de Nely es tener un negocio grande en el futuro, en el cual pueda atender mas personas comodamente.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de alimentos para la preparacion de las golosinas.
Nely tambien vende sopa de mondongo los domingos, dicha sopa es un plato tipico que es muy sabroso.
texts.en:
Nely is 45 years old. She lives in the Barrio Victoria neighborhood and sells snacks and soft drinks. She runs her business out of her house, where she prepares delicious treats like tacos, enchiladas, sliced plantain with meat, grilled beef, fried chicken, etc.
Nely lives with her husband and a daughter. She is a serious woman and doesn't smile much, but she is friendly and is known to be very responsible. Her goal is to have a large business in the future where she can serve more customers comfortably.
She will use the loan to buy ingredients for preparing food.
Nely also sells tripe soup on Sundays. It's a typical dish of the region and is very delicious.

loans.use: to purchase tortillas, beef, pork, chicken, condiments, cabbage, onions, limes, oil, lard, beans, rice, plantains, cheese, butter, eggs, soft drinks, and disposable plates and cups.

loans.name: Bani Dolores

texts.es:
La señora Bani es socia del banco comunal "Mujeres Triunfadoras" del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.
Son dos años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de  Manuela Ramos, tiene un  restaurante situado en un lugar bien transitado y tiene clientela casi todo el día.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles mandará  a refaccionar el lavatorio que se encuentra malogrado, comprará 2 tazones grandes, 3 ollas medianas, 2 fuentes, 1 sartén grande, 1 secador de arroz, 1 pelador de papas, 1 docena de jarritas de vidrio,  1 docena de vasos de vidrio.
Este negocio le ha dado muchas satisfacciones para su familia, cada vez tiene más ingresos y seguirá implementandolo con otras cosas que aúnhacen falta.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por la ayuda económica, ahora su hermana trabaja en su negocio, ya está generando empleo.
texts.en:
Bani is a member of the 'Mujeres Triunfadoras' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 34 years old, married, and has two children.  She has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for two years.  She has a restaurant in a busy area and has customers almost all day long.

Bani will use her new loan for 1,500 soles to have a sink, which is currently out of order, fixed.  She will also buy 2 large bowls, 3 medium-sized pans, 2 dishes, 1 large skillet, 1 rice dryer, 1 potato peeler, 1 dozen glass pitchers and 1 dozen glasses.

This business has given Bani's family a lot of satisfaction.  She is making more and more income and will continue equipping her business with other things that she needs.

Bani is grateful to Manuela Ramos for the financial help.  Her sister now also works in her business.  She is creating employment.

loans.use: to buy pans, pitchers, dishes, etc.

loans.name: Rosalbina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Rosalbina; ella tiene 58 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia sigue en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes,ella vende arroz,azucar,leche y fideos,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,ella por medio de este engocio sigue sacando adelante a su familia,al socia quiere ampliar y seguir mejorando el negocio de tienda de abarrotes .La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz,azucar,leche,fideos y galletas.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosalbina is 58 years old and married with two children. She has a grocery store where she sells rice, sugar, milk, and noodles. She works there from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. This business is helping her give her family a better life. She would like to expand and improve the business, and is requesting a loan to buy products for her shop like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, and cookies.

Rosalbina is very happy about this loan and promises to pay it off in full.

loans.use: to buy products for her shop like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, and cookies.

loans.name: Maria De La Luz

texts.es:
La señora Maria de la Luz tiene 36 años de edad, vive en la aldea el Pedrerito la Montaña y se dedica a la venta de golosinas desde hace 4 años, sus ventas las realiza en las fincas meloneras y cañeras de la zona sur del pais, sus clientes son empleados de estas fincas y sus ventas son al credito, Maria todos los dias se levanta muy temprano para preparar sus golosinas para luego salir a venderlas.
Maria vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos, tiene casa propia.
la meta de Maria es remodelar su casa para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria de la Luz is 36 years old and lives in the village of El Pedrerito la Montaña.  She has been selling food for four years.  She makes her sales on the melon and sugar plantations in the south of the country.  Her customers are people who work on these farms and she makes her sales on credit.  Every day, Maria gets up very early to prepare her food so that she can then go out and sell it.

María lives with her husband and three children.  She owns her own home.

María's goal is to remodel her house so that she can provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beef, pork, chicken, gas, tortillas, vegetables, oil, butter, seasonings, bread, eggs, beans, rice, soft drinks, and disposable plates and cups

loans.name: Ayudanos Señor 4 & 5 Group

texts.es:
Cita es una D. los miembros del Grupo Ayúdanos Señor 4 & 5 y está ubicado en L. ciudad turística D. L. Romana, en unas D. las comunidades D. más escasos recursos, rodeadas por campos D. Caña D. azúcar también llamados Batey, donD. L. mayoría D. los habitantes son inmigrantes haitianos, que vinieron a L. República Dominicana, con L. finalidad D. mejorar su calidad D. vida.

Cita esta muy emocionada por recibir su tercer préstamo con Esperanza Internacional, desD. que el programa llego a su comunidad, decidió formar parte del grupo con L. finalidad D. mejorar su negocio, el cual estaba falto D. capital. ElL. opera un puesto D. ventas D. frutas, verduras, vegetales y pollo, desD. su pequeña vivienda, L. cual comparte con su pareja, ya que parte D. su familia e hijos viven en Haití. 


Piensa invertir este préstamo en L. compra D. vegetales, varios quintales D. pollo y frutas. ElL. les venD. a sus vecinos, ya que por lo regular, los bayetes son comunidades aisladas y lejanas a L. ciudad. Cita desea ahorrar sus ganancias, ya que sus planes futuro es poder tener su propia casa y un mejor negocio.
texts.en: Cita is one of the members of the "Ayúdanos Señor 4 & 5" (Help Us Lord 4 & 5) Group, which is located in the tourist city of L. Romana, in one of the poorest communities, surrounded by sugar cane fields. These communities are also called batey and most of their inhabitants are Haitian immigrants who came to the Dominican Republic with the aim of improving their quality of life. Cita is very excited to be receiving her third loan from Esperanza Internacional. When the program arrived in her community, she decided to join the group with the aim of improving her business which was lacking capital. She runs a fruit, vegetable and chicken stall from her small home which she shares with her partner, as some of her family and children live in Haiti. Cita plans to invest this loan in buying vegetables, several 100lb lots of chicken and fruit. She sells her products to her neightors as 'bateyes' (sugar worker towns) are isolated communities which are far from the city. Cita would like to save her profits as her future plans are to own her own home and to have a better business.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, chicken, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
Maria Concepción tiene 48 años de edad, vive con su esposo, y cinco hijos. Ella se dedica a diversas actividades productivas. Maria Concepción vende pescado 2 veces por semana, otros días vende pan o verduras, o trabaja en sus cultivos de maíz y frijol.

Maria Concepción ha pedido un préstamo a Fundación Campo para la compra de abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para su cultivo. Con la ayuda del préstamo ella podrá comprar todo lo necesario para el cultivo, y seguir con las ventas de los otros productos. Sin el préstamo Maria Concepción no podría seguir vendiendo los otros productos, ya que tendria que invertir su dinero en sus cultivos. El préstamo tambien le permitirá el comprar todos los insumos al mismo tiempo, recibiendo mejor precio, y ahorrando dinero en transporte. 

En un futuro Maria Concepción quisiera poder cultivar sin tener que estar endeudada, y poder darle a sus hijos menores un estudio más allá del bachillerato. Maria Concepción desea lo mejor para sus hijos por lo que trabaja fuertemente todos los días.
texts.en:
Maria Concepción is 48 years old and lives with her husband and five children.  She works in a number of different business activities.  Twice a week she sells fish and on other days she sells bread or vegetables, or works on her corn and bean crops. 

Maria Concepción has requested a loan from Fundación Campo to buy manure, pesticides and herbicides for her crops.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy everything she needs for her crops and also continue selling her other products.  Without the loan, Maria Concepción wouldn't be able to continue selling her other products as she would have to invest her money in her crops.  This loan will also allow her to buy all her supplies at the same time which means she will receive a better price and will save money on transport.

In the future, Maria Concepción would like to be able to grow her crops without having to be in debt.  She would also like to be able to provide her children with an education beyond the high school level.  She wants the best for her children and she works hard every day in order to achieve it.

loans.use: to buy manure, pesticides and herbicides for her corn and bean crops

loans.name: Maria Mireya

texts.es:
La señora María es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Trabajadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 49 años D. edad, está casada y tiene cuatro hijos.
Es una D. las fundadoras D. este banco comunal y se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza por catálogo,  tiene  tres hijos a su cargo, dos D. ellos estudian en un instituto y con el negocio que tiene ayuda a su esposo con algunos gastos.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1,800.00 nuevos soles comprará: 3 colonias para después del baño, 2 talcos para pies, 2 labiales, 3 polvos para cara, 2 cremas para mano, 2 esmalte D. uñas, 2 set D. sombras, 4 desodorantes.
Su esposo trabaja como relacionista público D. un alcalD. D. un caserío, tiene una pequeña emisora D. radio que es con lo que mantiene a su familia.
Están muy agradecidos por todo lo que han logrado hasta el momento.
texts.en:
María is a member of the "Mujeres Trabajadoras" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 49 years old, married, and has four children.

María is one of the founders of this community bank.  Her business is selling beauty products through a catalog.  She is responsible for three children, two of whom are in school.  Through her business, she is able to help her husband with some expenses.

With this new loan for 1,800 soles, María will buy 3 lots of after-bath cologne, 2 lots of foot powder, 2 lipsticks, 3 lots of face powder, 2 lots of hand cream, 2 lots of nail polish, 2 sets of eye shadow and 4 deodorants.

María's husband works as a public relations officer for the mayor of a small village.  He also has a small radio station which is how he supports his family.  The couple are grateful for everything that they have achieved up to now.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and cosmetics

loans.name: María Rosa

texts.es:
María tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene dos hijos, viven en Salcedo que está ubicado a 20 minuto de Latacunga en la Sierra Centro de Ecuador. Se describe como una persona buena, tranquila, amistosa y cariñosa.

Trabaja con su familia en la compra, crianza y venta de animales como son los cerdos, pollos. Es el primer crédito solicitado a Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de crías de cerdos, pollos para su engorde y posteriormente para su venta que generará buenos ingresos lo cual le ayudará a que sus hijos acaben de estudiar y mejoraran su calidad de vida.

Su sueño principal es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
María is 42 years old and married with two children. They live in Salcedo, which is located 20 minutes from Latacunga in the Central Sierra area of Ecuador. She is described as a good person, quiet, friendly and caring.

She works with her family in the buying, breeding and selling of animals such as pigs and chickens. 

This is her first loan with Fodemi. She will use the loan to buy piglets to fatten, along with some chickens for later resale. The income she earns will help her children finish their education and improve their quality of life. 

Her biggest dream is that her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy piglets to fatten, along with some chickens for later resale

loans.name: Lady Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian, como la llaman sus amistades, es socia del Banco Comunal “San Miguel” del distrito Ilave en el departamento Puno y tiene 23 años. Vive con su conviviente y sus 2 hijos en una casa un poco alejado de su negocio. 
Está con Manuela Ramos desde hace cuatro años y tiene su negocio desde hace tres años. Vende dulces en su puesto (tienda). Fue idea propia de establecerlo y no cuenta con apoyo de nadie. Esta actividad le demanda casi todo el día pero cuenta con la compañía de sus hijos. El mayor está en el primer año de primaria y cada día después del colegio va a ver y acompañar a su mamá en el negocio. El nuevo préstamo de S./ 2,500.00 lo va a invertir en compra de galosinas y la compra de una moto para movilizarse mejor.
Su sueño es tener un negocio más grande y una casa propia.  Lo que le gusta de Manuela Ramos es que los préstamos se pagan rápido. Además le gustan las reuniones donde se relaja y arpende de los temas educativos.
texts.en:
Mirian, as her friends call her, is a member of San Miguel Communal Bank in the Ilave district of the department of Puno.  She is 23 years old and lives with her partner and two children in a house located somewhat far away from her business.

She has been with the Manuel Ramos movement for four years and has had her business for three years.  She sell sweets in her store.  It was her own idea to start the business and she has no help from anybody.  The business is demanding almost all day, but she has the company of her children.  The oldest is in the first year of elementary school, and every day after school he goes to the store to see his mother and keep her company. 

She is going to use the current loan of 2,500 PEN to buy sweets and a motorcycle so she can get around more easily.

Her dream is to have a bigger business and her own house.

What she likes about Manuela Ramos is that the loans are paid off quickly.  She also likes the meetings, where she relaxes and learns from the educational topics.

loans.use: to buy sweets and a motorcycle.

loans.name: Saby Carol

texts.es:
Saby es socia del Banco Comunal “Semillas del Futuro” de la ciudad Puno en el departamento Puno. Vive con su pareja y tienen dos hijos de 9 y 11 años. 
Saby confecciona y vende artículos deportivos en una tienda que es suya y que mantiene desde hace más de cinco años. Aprendió a confeccionar gracias a sus padres y también ha heredado las ganas de hacer negocio, como nos cuenta. Inició este negocio por idea propia y sólo con la ayuda de su pareja. Él se encarga de hacer las costuras y estampados, mientras que ella hace las compras y atiende a los clientes. 
Iniciaron su negocio con un capital de S./ 500,00. Saby lleva un año con Manuela Ramos y su nuevo préstamos será de S./ 1,000.00. dinero que invertirá en la compra de telas para los polos y pelotas que confeccionará.
Su meta es tener una máquina bordadora para facilitar el trabajo y ahorrar tiempo. Lo que le gusta de Manuela Ramos son las capacitaciones y las reuniones donde las mujeres comparten anécdotas.
texts.en:
Saby is a member of the communal bank Semillas del Future (Seeds of the Future) located in the city of Puno in the department of Puno. She lives with her partner and they have two children 9 and 11 years old.

Savy makes and sells sporting goods in her own store that she has had for more than 5 years. She learned this occupation from her parents and also she inherited from them the desire to be in business, so she tells us. 

It was her own idea to begin this business only with the help of her husband. He is in charge of sewing and the patterns, while she takes care of purchases and assisting clients.

They began their business with 500 soles. Saby has been working with Manuela Ramos for a year and her new loan will be 1,000 soles that she will use in the purchase of materials needed to produce sport shirts and balls.

Her goal is to have an overlapping embroidery sewing machine to make their work easier and to save time. What she likes about Manuela Ramos is the training and the meetings where women get together and share their stories.

loans.use: to buy material at wholesale prices

loans.name: Sobeida Yanori

texts.es:
la sra. Sobeida tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera pero se a quedado sola ya que su familia vive en los Estados Unidos, Sobeida se dedica a la venta de refrescos en varios tamaños, tiene varios años de estar atendiendo a sus clientes y este negocio es herencia de familia, Sobeida quiere seguir invirtiendo en el, ya que dichos refrescos se venden rapido y se les obtiene una buena ganancia, sus clientes son sus vecinos  y amigos que tiene en diferentes caserios cercanos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mas refrescos, desea tener mas inventario ya que el carro repartidor solo pasa una vez por semana y en ocasiones a fines de semana se esta quedando sin producto.
el sueño de Sobeida es casarse y tener hijos para formar una bonita familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Sobeida, 22, is single and lives alone.  Her family lives in the United States.  Sobeida has a retail business, selling various sizes of soft drinks.  She learned the business from her parents and has operated it for several years.  She wants to continue investing in the business because soft drinks sell quickly and she earns a good living from the revenues.  Her customers live in surrounding neighborhoods.  
Sobeida will use the loan to buy more soft drinks.  She wants to keep more inventory because her distributor only passes through the area once a week and she sometimes runs out of product at weekends.  
Sobeida's greatest hope is to marry, have children and shape a happy home.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks for her retail business.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Gladys; ella tiene 33 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia sigue en su negocio de venta de frutas,ella vende manzanas,naranjas,uvas,platanos entre otras frutas y tambien se dedica a vender coronas de caridad,por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas como amanzanas,naranjas y platanos al por mayor y para comprar coronas de caridad.al por mayor.
                                                        
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Our member, Sra. Gladys, is 33 years old.  She is partnered and has 3 children.  She operates a fruit business, selling apples, oranges, grapes, bananas and other fruits.  She also sells "coronas de caridad" [an offering of penitence or hope].  The business is her means of supporting her children.  She is applying for a loan that she will use to buy wholesale supplies of fruits and "coronas de caridad".  

Sra. Gladys is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her retail business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a concrete side wall to finish the work he is doing in phases.

loans.name: Alejandrina Rosa

texts.es:
Alejandrina es socia del Banco Comunal “San Miguel” del distrito de Ilave, en el departamento Puno.  Tiene 45 años, es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos entre 10 y 22 años.
Estudió enfermería y trabaja todo el día en un hospital. Además tiene un negocio de venta de productos de belleza que lleva desde hace unos cuatro años y que estableció copn el primer préstamo de Manuela Ramos. 
Inició con un capital de S./ 500,00 y gracias a su clientela fija y puntual su negocio está bien establecido. Cuenta que tiene algunos productos en stock, así que cuando alguien tiene la necesidad de un desodorante por ejemplo ella puede atenderlo de inmediato. Con éste préstamo de S./ 2,500 comprará nuevos perfumes y joyas. 
Dos de sus cuatro hijos ya están estudiando una carera en la universidad y su sueño es que todos sus hijos sean profesionales. Además tiene la meta de tener una tienda propia. Lo que le gusta de Manuela Ramos son las reuniones donde una se relaja y se olvide de los problemas.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is a member of the Communal Bank San Miguel in the district de Ilave in the department of Puno. She is 45 years old, living together with a partner, and has 4 children between 10 and 22 years old. 

She studied to be a nurse and works all day in a hospital. Also, she has had a business of selling beauty products for some four years and had her first loan through the communal bank of Manuela Ramos.

She began with the amount of 500 soles and thanks to her customers she was able to make her payments on time and so when someone had the need for deodorant, for example, she could immediately assist them. With this loan of 2,500 soles she will buy new perfume and jewelry.

Two of her four children are studying for a career at the university and her dream is that all her children become professionals. She also has a goal of having her own store. What she likes about Manuela Ramos is the meetings where she can relax and forget her problems.

loans.use: to buy perfume and jewelry for resale

loans.name: Rosalva Virginia

texts.es:
La señora Rosalva es socia del banco comunal Las Divinas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.
Lleva cuatro años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta de comida, esta actividad la realiza los días domingos, su casa se encuentra cerca de un coliseo de gallos donde ese día las personas acuden masivamente a este local.
Con su nuevo préstamo S/. 2,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 2 juegos de mesas, un ciento de  platos descartables, 1 ciento de tenedores descartables, 2 taper de plástico.
Mas delante de acuerdo a las necesidades que tenga en su negocio pedirá otro préstamo para seguir implementando su negoico. Su esposo es mecánico y es el que mantiene su hogar, ella de su parte está trabajando con la venta de sus comidas para generar sus propios ingresos y apoyar con otros gastos.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosalva, 27, is a member of the Las Divinas del Distrito de Calleria in the Peruvian "departamento" of Ucayali.  She is married and has 2 children.  
She has supported her business with loans from Manuela Ramos for the past four years.  She operates a food-sales business on Sundays.  Her house is near a place where many people gather on Sundays for local cockfights.  She will use this loan, for S/.2,500 new soles to buy: 2 tables, disposable plates and cutlery and other supplies that she needs for the business.  
Sra. Rosalva plans to ask for other loans later that she will use to support the business.  Her husband is a mechanic and provides for everyday family expenses.  Her business provides her with an income of her own and pays for other family expenses.

loans.use: to buy tables and other supplies for her food-sales business.

loans.name: Ninoska Yamaly

texts.es:
Ninoska tiene 21 años de edad, esta soltera y vive con sus padres, Ninoska se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion,  desea invertir el credito en compra de abarroteria para surtir su negocio, ya que sus clientes le estan pidiendo que tenga mas variedad de productos, y ella no quiere que sus clientes opten por comprar en otro lugar.
el sueno de Ninoska es graduarse de la Universidad.
texts.en:
Ninoska is 21 years old, single, and lives with her parents. She has a business selling everyday consumer products from a store in her home.

Ninoska wants to invest this loan in the purchase of groceries to restock her business since her customers are requesting that she carry a wider variety of products. She does not want her customers to go shopping elsewhere.

Ninoska’s dream is to graduate from university.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Titomangba Group

texts.fr: Le groupe TITOMANGBA est composé de deux personnes qui sont des cohabitants. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de  Sèwanoudé Suzanne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Sèwanoudé Suzanne est âgée de 55 ans et vit au Bénin.Sèwanoudé Suzanne est une veuve qui a cinq enfants tous scolarisés dont trois restent encore à sa charge. Sèwanoudé Suzanne n'a jamais été à l'école.Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Sèwanoudé Suzanne mène comme activité depuis dix ans la vente des pommes en fruit.A côté de cette activité,Sèwanoudé Suzanne prépare du frommage à base du soja. Sèwanoudé Suzanne s’approvisionne en pomme et en soja dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu Sèwanoudé Suzanne sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe TITOMANGBA,un quatrième crédit. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group TITOMANGBA is comprised of two persons who live together. This is the fourth time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé to boost their business. The group's representative, by the name of Sèwanoudé Suzanne, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 55 years old and lives in Benin. She is a widow who has five children, all in school. Three of the children are still in her care. 

Sèwanoudé Suzanne has never been to school. To support herself and her children, she has been running a business for ten years selling apples. Aside from this business, she makes tofu. Her supplies of apples and soybeans come from one of the markets of Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and increasing her sales and her revenues, Sèwanoudé Suzanne and her group TITOMANGBA are requesting a fourth loan. The previously obtained loans have indeed been repaid.

loans.use: to buy fruit and soybeans

loans.name: Fátima Del Socorro

texts.es:
Fatima sigue laborando en zona franca, el cual ejerce como operaria, lugar donde lleva varios años trabajando, su hijo sigue creciendo, el cual le ha venido dando educacion sola, pero hoy en dia, tiene un compañero el cual labora como tornero, y esta en mejores condiciones moral y economica.
Ella tiene su cuarto aparte, y que ha venido mejorando sola, con los prestamo que Afodenic  ha dado. Lo que quiere hacer, con este nuevo financiamiento, es levantar las divisiones de concreto, ya que es de madera, aunque lo tiene bien adornado, pero ya esta muy viejo y se le hace incomodo ya. Es por tal razon comprara materiales de construccion en bloque, hierro, cemento, y hacer la mejora en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Fatima continues to work in the free trade zone where she has a job as an operator. She has worked in this place for several years. As her son continues to grow, Fatima is the only one providing for his education. Today she has a companion who works as a lathe operator. He provides both moral and financial support.

Fatima has a separate room, which was the only improvement that was undertaken with the loan given to her by AFODENIC. With this new loan, she will put up concrete room dividers since the current ones are made of wood. Although they are well-decorated, the dividers are very old and make her house uncomfortable. For this reason, she will buy construction materials such as blocks, iron, and cement, so that she can make this improvement to her home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for putting up concrete room dividers.

loans.name: Jose Isabel

texts.es:
Don Jose tiene 41 años de edad, esta casado y es padre de tres hijos, Jose se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva para caballero, trabaja duro para sacar adelante a su familia, su esposa se dedica a la venta de carne de res, juntos trabajan para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus tres hijos.
Jose utilizara el credito para comprar ropa y asi tener mas variedad, Jose se esta preparando para la epoca navideña, asi podra tener mayores ventas y mas ganancias.
la meta de Jose y su esposa es que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Don Jose is 41 years old, married, and the father of three children. He sells new clothing for men. Jose works hard in order for his family to get ahead. His wife sells beef. They work together to provide a better quality of life for their three children.

Jose will use this loan to buy clothing so that he will have more variety. He is preparing for the Christmas season so that he will have better sales and more revenue. The goal of Jose and his wife is to see their children become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy jeans, shirts, and undergarments.

loans.name: Augustina

texts.es:
Augustina es socia del Banco Comunal “Semillas del Futuro” de la ciudad Puno en el departamento Puno y tiene 57 años. Es soltera y tiene a 5 hijos entre 15 y 32 años. Dos de ellos cuentan con educación superior.
Durante la semana atiene un pequeño puesto de frutas en un mercado de la zona, mientras que durante el fin de semana vende sus productos en la puerta de su casa. Este negocio lo tiene desde hace unos 30 años, nos cuenta que antes se dedicaba a vender zapatos. Siempre ha trabajado sóla, su ex esposo no le apoyó. 
Su meta es ayudar a sus hijos y con el nuevo préstamo de S./ 1,000.00 va a comprar frutas al por mayor  como papayas, pepinos y plátano. Este negocio es sacrificado, además que necesita de su fuerza para trasladar los paquetes de frutas desde su almacén a su puesto, por eso espera poder tener otro negocio pronto.

Lleva 7 años con Manuela Ramos y le gusta el préstamo rápido y el compañerismo que experimenta en su Banco Comunal.
texts.en:
Augustina is a member of the Communal Bank “Semillas del Futuro” (Seeds of the Future) which is located in the city of Puno, Department of Puno. She is single and has five children between the ages of 15 and 32. Two of her children received their higher education.

During the week, Augustina manages a small fruit stand at the local market. On the weekends, she sells her products from the doorstep of her house. She has been in this business for about 30 years. Augustina says that she previously sold shoes. She always works alone since her ex-husband does not support her. Her goal is to help her children and with this new loan of 1000 PEN, she will buy fruits in bulk such as papayas, pepino melons, and bananas. This business requires sacrifice plus she needs her strength to carry packages of fruit from her warehouse to her stand. She hopes to start another business soon.

Augustina has been with Manuela Ramos for seven years and enjoys the quick approval of the loans and the camaraderie that she experiences through her Communal Bank.

loans.use: to buy papayas, pepino melons, and bananas.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
La señora Norma es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 65 años, está casada y tiene seis hijos mayores.
Lleva cinco años trabajando con Manuela Ramos, tiene una pequeña bodega en su casa, todo el dinero que obtiene del préstamo lo invierte en su bodega, en su casa solo vive con su esposo que está convaleciente y tiene que atenderlo.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: ½ caja D. leche chica, 1/2 caja D. aceite D. medio litro, ½ docena, 1 paquete D. sal, 5 casilleros D. huevo, 2 paquetes D. papel higiénico, ½ saco D. azúcar, 5 paquetes D. fosforo, 1 paquete D. fideos para sopa.  
Son los productos que mas salida tiene y no tienen que faltar en su bodega, entre la bodega y los quehaceres D. su hogar se pasa casi todo el día y también en atender a su esposo.
Su bodega no le da mucho dinero pero le sirve para poder cumplir con sus pagos a Manuela Ramos, es una socia muy fiel a Manuela Ramos porque es con la única institución que trabaja.
texts.en:
Sra. Norma is a member of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Triunfadoras” (Triumphant Women) which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 65 years old, married, and has six grown children.

Norma has been working with Manuela Ramos for five years. She has a small store in her home. All of the money she has obtained from her loans has been invested into her business. She lives at home with her husband, who is a convalescent and requires attention.

With this new loan of 1000 PEN, Normal will buy a half case of small milk containers, a half case of oil in half-liter containers, one packet of salt, five cases of eggs, two packets of toilet paper, a half sack of sugar, five packets of matches, and one packet of soup noodles. These are the products that sell more quickly, so she lacks these items in her store. Managing her store and performing the household chores take up most of Norma’s time and she also attends to her husband.

Her store does not generate much money, but it does allow her to complete her loan payments to Manuela Ramos. Norma is a loyal member of Manuela Ramos because it is the only organization in which she participates.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Elza

texts.en:
Elza is 45 years old. She lives in the village of Sairkhe in the Imereti Region of West Georgia. She is married and lives with her children: two sons (24 and 21 years old) and a daughter, 22 years old. Elza's sons are construction workers. They work on construction in their and nearby villages. Elza's daughter is a pharmacist. She works in a village pharmacy. 

Elza leads the agricultural business of the family. They own a milk cow and sell dairy products in Zestaponi (a nearby town). Also the family has a small poultry farm. They sell eggs at the same market. Along with the above, Elza sells grapes, harvested from 200 family-owned vines. The total average monthly income of the family is 400 Laris (approximately $240). 

Elza requested a loan to purchase a milk cow. She will increase her sales of dairy products and thus raise the income of the family. The family members will be able to purchase needed household goods and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Soso

texts.en:
Soso is from the village of Tskhratskaro. He is 65 years old, married, and lives with his wife Tsiuri. Soso works in the Zestaphoni Railway Company. Along with his regular job, he has an agricultural business. His family has a small dairy farm – three cows, four calves and a bull. Soso and Tsiuri sell dairy products to the retailers in the Zestaphoni open market. 

Along with the dairy farm, the family has two pigs. Their piglets are sold at the same market. The total average monthly income of the family is 800 Laris (approximately $480). 

Soso requested credit for purchasing two additional milk cows. Soso and Tsiuri will produce more dairy products and increase sales. It will positively impact the income of the family. They will be able to spend more on satisfying the family's daily needs and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows

loans.name: Reyna Milagro

texts.es:
Reyna tiene 21 años de edad, esta soltera y se ha dedicado en los últimos años a la venta de productos varios, como ser hilos, madejas, cintas, toallas y otros productos de uso personal, abre su negocio de lunes a domingo y sus clientes son los vecinos de la comunidad y amigos que le visitan.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia y asi surtir un poco el negocio, ya que hay productos que ella no tiene en existencia y sus clientes le piden dichos productos.
Reyna tiene el sueño de que en un futuro su negocio sea grande y ser una buena administradora.
nos comento que se siente muy feliz ya que a su corta edad ya tiene negocio propio.
texts.en:
Reyna is 21 years old, single, and has spent the past few years selling different products such as thread, yarn, ribbons, towels, and other products for personal use. Her business is open from Monday through Sunday. Her customers consist of neighbors from the community and friends who visit her.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise so that she can restock her business a little more. There are products that she does not have but her customers are requesting.

In the future, Reyna dreams of having a large business and being a good manager. She says that she is pleased to have her own business at such a young age.

loans.use: to buy thread, yarn, towels, decorative ribbons, shampoos, hair conditioners, deodorants, lotions, crèmes, baby oil, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Vladimer

texts.en:
Vladimer is 46 years old, single, and lives with his parents.  He is a farmer from the Zovreti, Imereti Region in the western part of the country. 

Vladimer leads his family's agricultural business. Specifically, they have three milk cows. Vladimer and his mother produce cheese and other dairy products and sell them in Zestaponi, a nearby town. Along with the dairy farm the family owns a 2000-square-meter vineyard. They sell grapes in the Zestaponi market as well. The total average monthly income of the family is 450 Laris, including the pensions of Vladimer’s parents. 

Vladimer is requesting a loan, which he will use to purchase a milk cow. The family will be able to sell more dairy products and raise their income. Part of the increase in income will be reinvested in farming activities and the rest will be used for improving the family's living conditions

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow.

loans.name: Mayra Veronica

texts.es:
Mayra tiene 28 años es casada y tiene tres hijos, vive con su familia en Machachi que está ubicado a 1 hora de Latacunga en la Sierra Centro del Ecuador. Mayra es una persona tranquila con el caracter fuerte para salir adelante con su esposo e hijos.

Mayra trabaja con su esposo en la crianza y venta de cerdos. Es el primer crédito que solicita a Fodemi el cual va a ser invertido en la compra de una chancha madre para hacerla reproducir, gracias a esta actividad podrá incrementar la cantidad de cerdos y después de criarlos podrá tener más ventas y mejores ingresos para ella y su familia.

Su sueño es llegar a tener 100 cerdos para convertirse en una proveedora a las empresas importantes.
texts.en:
Mayra is 28 years old, married, and has three children. She lives with her family in Machachi, which is located an hour away from Latacunga in the central mountains of Ecuador. Mayra is a peaceful individual with strong character. She wants to move forward along with her husband and children.

Mayra and her husband work together raising and selling pigs. This is the first loan she has requested from FODEMI and she will invest in the purchase of a sow for breeding. Thanks to her business, she will be able to increase the number of pigs she has on hand. Once they are grown, she wants to generate more sales and improve the income for herself and her family.

Mayra’s dream is to have 100 pigs so that she can become a supplier to large businesses.

loans.use: to buy a sow for breeding.

loans.name: Akaki

texts.en:
Akaki is from the village of Martkopi in East Georgia. He lives in the village with his parents. He is a worker. Along with his main job, he helps his parents with the family dairy farm. They have four milk cows and sell milk and yogurt in Tbilisi (the capital of the country). The total average monthly income of the family is 400 Laris (approximately $240). 

Akaki requested a loan to purchase calves. The family has enough space in the cattle-shed. They will grow the calves during winter and sell them for a profit in the spring. The family will get additional income. Akaki plans to save it for purchasing a milk cow, in order to expand the dairy farm and increase the income of the family.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Reyna, tiene 34 años de edad, vive en la aldea La Esperanza. Vive en una comunidad rural del departamento de Colon. Ella es casada, pero su esposo vive fuera del país. Tienen 2 hijos  de 16 y 11 años de edad, ambos están estudiando. 

Su actividad económica que le genera ingresos es una pequeña pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica (manteca, cereal, arroz, sopas, kétchup, papel higiénico, salsas, frijoles, sal, etc.).

Comenzó su negocio desde el año 2008, trabajando muy duro desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche lo que le a permitido incrementar su inventario de L.4,000.00 a L.16,000.00 acompañado de la buena administración. 

Ahora con ODEF va solucionar las dificultades de financiamiento que a tenido, por tanto solicito un préstamo de L.5,000.00 para surtir mas su negocio en productos de la canasta básica o alimenticios y cumplir con su gran sueño de llegar a ser un mini súper.

Los ingresos que obtiene los destina para cubrir las necesidades básicas del hogar, principalmente la alimentación y educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Reyna, age 34, lives in the La Esperanza village.  This is a rural community in the Colon department.  She is married, but her husband lives outside of the country.  She has two children, ages 16 and 11.  Both of the children are in school.

The financial activity that generates income for her is a small grocery store.  That is where she sells everyday food products (butter, grains, rice, soup, ketchup, toilet paper, salsas, beans, and salt, etc.). 

She has had her business since 2008, working hard from 6am to 7pm, which has allowed her to increase her investment from 4,000 lempira to 16,000 lempira. This increase has also been the result of good administration.

When she started her business she had difficulties because of the lack of financing to invest in the business.

She has currently requested a loan from ODEF for 5,000 lempira (HNL), which will allow her to solve some financing difficulties.  She intends to use the loan to increase her inventory and hopes to use her earnings to establish a mini-supermarket.

She intends to use the income that she gets to cover the basic household necessities, primarily food and her children’s education.

loans.use: to stock her business with everyday food products.

loans.name: Gocha

texts.en:
Gocha is 45 years old. He lives in the village of Sartichala, East Georgia with his family: his wife Irma, two sons (22 and 21 years old), a daughter (16 years old) and his 71-year-old father. Gocha's daughter goes to school. His younger son is a student and the elder son works in a hospital, as a doctor's assistant. 

Gocha and Irma lead the agricultural business of the family. Gocha's father helps them. The family has three milk cows and six calves. They produce cheese and sell it locally to dairy product retailers. Along with the dairy the family has small pig farm with two pigs. They sell piglets on local market. Also Gocha grows maize on a family-owned plot of land. Part of the harvested corn is sold to the wholesalers and the rest is used for feeding their livestock. The total average monthly income of the family is 1000 Laris (approximately $600). 

With this loan Gocha plans to purchase 10 calves. He will raise them and sell the grown calves in the spring for a much higher price. This will bring additional income to the family. Gocha plans to reinvest part of the increased income in the family farm and the other part will be used for financing the children's education.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Confianza En Dios 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.es:
