Mireya es una madre dedicada, tiene 2 hijos que viven con ella y su esposo (también el padre de ambos), ella se ha esforzado realizando diferentes trabajos para ayudar a su esposo con las necesidades de su hogar y poder llevar ingresos extra, quiere lograr unos de sus retos mas difíciles, el cual es tener una casa propia. 

Mireya es una de los miembros del Grupo Confianza en Dios 1, 2 & 3 y está ubicado en la ciudad turística de La Romana, en unas de las comunidades de más escasos recursos, rodeadas por campos de Caña de azúcar también llamados Batey, donde la mayoría de los habitantes son inmigrantes haitianos, que vinieron a la República Dominicana, con la finalidad de mejorar su calidad de vida.

Mireya esta muy emocionada por recibir su primer préstamo con Esperanza Internacional, y lo invertirá en la compra de diferentes tipos de ropas, para hombres y mujeres, también desea invertir en la compra de pescado, el cual vende frito. Ella lleva varios años dedicada a la venta de ropas, y con este préstamo tiene los planes de hacer crecer su negocio y llevarlo a otro nivel, para así utilizar sus ganancias para realizar cambios en su vida, ahorrar, comprar su casa, ayudar mas a su familia.
texts.en:
Mireya is a dedicated mother who has two children who live with her and her husband (the children's father).  She has done different jobs to help her husband with the household necessities and bring in extra income.  She wants to accomplish one of her most difficult goals, to have her own home.  

Mireya is one of the members of the Confianza en Dios 1, 2, & 3 group, which is located in the resort city of La Romana, in one of the communities without many resources.  It is surrounded by sugarcane fields, also called Batey.  A majority of the inhabitants are Haitian immigrants who came to the Dominican Republic to improve their quality of life.

Mireya is very excited to receive her first loan with Esperanza International.  She will invest the loan in the purchase of different types of clothing for women and men.  She also wants to purchase fish, which she will sell fried.  She has worked selling clothing for many years, and with this loan, she plans to grow her business and bring it to another level.  She can then use her earnings to make changes in her life, including saving money, purchasing a house, and helping her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and fish.

loans.name: Aquilina

texts.es:
La señora es socia del banco comunal Las Triunfadoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos, solo dos de ellos están a su cargo.
Lleva recién 4 ciclos trabajando con los  préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de comida en una de las calles del centro d la ciudad y lo hace desde el medio día, está cerca de una universidad y los alumnos son sus principales clientes.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: 3 fuentes de fierro enlozado,  2  cucharas para servir, 5 manteles  de tela, 1 balde refresquero, 3 banquitos de madera, 1.5 metros de mantel de plástico.
A pesar que tiene que salir de su casa para trabajar lo hace con mucho gusto porque es parte de su trabajo y le gusta lo que hace, gracias a ese negocio mantiene y educa a sus dos hijos, no cuenta con ayuda de nadie.
Por ahora se siente tranquila porque cuenta con la ayuda de Manuela Ramos para ir implementando su negocio y mejorar cada dia.
texts.en:
Aquilina is a member of the Las Triunfadoras comunal bank in the Calleria district, Ucayali department.  She is 48 years old and single.  She has four children; only two of them are under her care.  She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for four cycles.  She sells food on one of the streets in the center of the city.  She starts at noon.  It is close to a university, and the students are her primary customers.

She will use her new loan for 1,200 soles to buy three kettles, two serving spoons, five cloth tablecloths, one ice chest, three small wooden stools, and a plastic tablecloth measuring 1.5 meters.

In spite of the fact that she has to leave her house to work, she does so with great pleasure.  This is part of her work, and she likes what she does.  Thanks to this business she supports and educates her two children.  She does not have help from anyone.

At the present time she feels at peace because she has the help from Manuela Ramos to continue carrying out her business and improving every day.

loans.use: to buy kettles and other cooking utensils.

loans.name: Carlos Alfredo

texts.es:
Carlos tiene 20 años de edad, es soltero y vive con su mamá.

Él se dedica desde los 14 años de edad a trabajar con las estructuras metálicas, y este le genera buenos ingresos para su familia.

Él compra los diferentes materiales que necesita para realizar su actividad, en una ferretería de la ciudad, para llegar ahí debe recorrer 8 kilómetros, luego tiene que pasar por una colina para ir a preparar lo que sus clientes le solicitan y luego regresar con el producto ya hecho donde sus clientes, él no tiene medio de transporte por lo que debe pagar para que trasladen las estructuras metálicas.

Carlos solicita un préstamo para, complementar una construcción de un muro de retención de la propiedad de su mamá, ella ya inicio la construcción pero le falta material para concluirlo y Carlos desea ayudarle a ella. De esta manera evitara la erosión de tierra en su propiedad hacia el camino vecinal, al mismo tiempo mejorara su vivienda y el lugar donde realiza su trabajo, esto le ayudara para satisfacer la demanda de su trabajo.
texts.en:
Carlos is 20 years old, single, and he lives with his mother.

Since the age of 14 he has been working as a blacksmith and this generates a good income for his family.

He busy different materials that he needs for his work from a hardware store in the city. To get there he must travel 8 kilometers and he also has to pass over a hill to start making the items that his clients. He later delivers the product already made to his clients. He doesn't have a mode of transportation which is why he needs to hire someone to transport these metallic structures.

Carlos requests a loan to complete the construction of a retaining wall for his mother's property. She already started the construction but she still needs materials to finish it, and Carlos wants to help her. This way they will stop the erosion of the grounds of the property facing the neighbors. At the same time he wants to improve his house and the place where he works. This will help him satisfy the demand for his work.

loans.use: to finish building a retaining wall for his home.

loans.name: Leyda Luz

texts.es:
La señora Leyda es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y no tiene hijos.
Se dedica a la venta de frutas de la región y lo hace en el patio de su casa, de forma ambulatoria, se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado a comprar frutas frescas para poner a la venta.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 ciento de naranja, ½ ciento de cocona, ¼ de ciento de limones, 3 piñas, 4 bandejitas de plásticos, 1 mesa de madera.
La fruta tiene que comparLa en pocas cantidades porque si no se pueden malograr y eso significa pérdida.
Como no tiene niños quiere ocupar su tiempo en algo útil que le genere algunos ingresos, su esposo es docente y es el que mantiene el hogar.
texts.en:
Señora Leyda is a member of Las Almendras Community Bank in Calleria district in the department of Ucayali. She is 40 years old, married, and doesn’t have any children.

Leyda earns her living by selling local fruit from a stall situated on the patio of her house. She gets up very early to go to the market to buy fresh fruit which she then sells.

With this new loan of S/.1,000 she will buy 100 oranges, 50 coconuts, 25 lemons, 3 pineapples, 4 lots of plastic bags, and a wooden table. She has to buy the fruit in small quantities otherwise they would turn bad and she would lose money.

As Leyda doesn’t have any children, she wants to do something useful with her time which will earn her some money. Her husband is a teacher and he pays for household expenses.

loans.use: to buy fruit

loans.name: Exaltacion Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “EXALTACIÓN” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Hilda. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Elaboración de mantas, venta de hilos, venta de quesos, venta de refrescos, venta de mantas y lana, tienda de barrio, venta de verduras.

La señora Hilda,  indica que es primera ves que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de quesos que viene trabajando hace un año atrás.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de queso), que comprara de Viacha y posteriormente lo venderá en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

En la fotografia acompaña al grupo la prima de la señora Juana, ella se esconde de cámaras.
texts.en:
The community bank "Exaltación" started its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Cascade Center.  It is made up of seven members and led by a board, which is headed by Hilda.  The businesses that the members of the community bank own are different, including: making blankets, yarn sales, cheese sales, beverage sales, blanket and wool sales, a neighborhood store, and vegetable sales.  

Hilda says that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer.  She was invited to join the group by a promoter.  She has a business selling cheeses that she started a year ago.  

She will use this loan to increase her capital and purchase cheese.  She purchases cheese in Viacha and then sells it at markets.  This work allows her to generate income to support her family, since she is married and has three children.  

In the photograph, Juana's cousin is also shown.  She hides from cameras.

loans.use: to purchase cheese.

loans.name: Neftali

texts.es:
Neftali tiene 47 años, es casado y tiene un hijo. Neftali comenzo a dedicarse a la agricultura desde los 12 años. Dicho oficio lo aprendio de su padre, quien con el afan de enseñarle a su hijo a trabajar no le permitio a Neftali ir a la escuela. Por ende Neftali tiene 35 años de experiencia como agricultor, y le gusta lo que él hace.

Neftali ha pedido un préstamo a Fundacion Campo para 10,500 metros cuadrados de tierra, donde el cultiva maiz y frijol. Debido a que la zona donde vive y cultiva Neftali es muy rural, el transporte es muy escaso y a Neftali se le dificulta llevar todos los insumos a su cultivo. Con la ayuda del préstamo Neftali ha podido comprar todo los insumos que necesita de una sola ves, adquiriendolos a mejor precio y ahorrandose el costo de tener que hacer varios viajes.

En un futuro Neftali quisiera poder sembrar una mayor cantidad, y poder obtener mayores cosechas para la venta.
texts.en:
Neftali is 47 years old, married, and he has a son. Neftali started out in agriculture when he was 12 years old. He learned the business from his father, who, for the sake of teaching his son to work, did not let Neftali go to school. Therefore Neftali has 35 years' experience as an agriculturist, and he loves what he does.

Neftali has requested a loan from Fundacion Campo (Kiva Field Partner) to invest in the 10500 square meters of land where he cultivates corn and beans. The region where Neftali lives is very rural so transportation is very limited. Neftali's challenge is transporting all of the materials to his land. With the help of this loan Neftali has been able to purchase all of the materials he needs all at once, obtaining a better price and saving on the cost of making several trips.

In the future Neftali would like to plant in larger quantities to increase his harvests for sale.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for the 10,500 square meters of farmland where he cultivates corn and beans.

loans.name: Enith Adelaida

texts.es:
La señora Enith es socia del banco comunal las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene  65 años de edad y 11 hijos, solo 1 a su cargo, los demás ya tiene sus respectivas familias.
Tiene una vulcanizadora  que funciona en su casa y su hijo es el que trabaja ahí, lleva tres años trabajando con Manuela Ramos y está contenta porque hizo nuevas amistades y  se siente contenta por trabajar con ese banco comunal.
Con su nuevo préstamo de  S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprara:   una plancha de parches, un litro de pegamento,  1 docena de cámaras, cuando las cámaras están muy picadas es mejor que sus clientes compren cámara nueva  y para darles facilidad va vender las cámaras.
Saca sus préstamos de acuerdo a las necesidades que tiene porque no quiere quedar mal con Manuela Ramos porque quiere seguir trabajando por mucho tiempo más.
texts.en:
Señora Enith is a member of Las Almendras Community Bank in Calleria district in the department of Ucayali. She is 65 years old and has eleven children. Only one of them still lives at home; the others have families of their own. 

Enith runs a repair shop out of her home. Her son also works there. She has worked with Kiva partner, Manuela Ramos, for three years and is very happy because she made new friends through this relationship with her community bank.

With this new loan of S/. 1,000 she will buy a box of patches, a litre of glue, a dozen inner tubes (when inner tubes are really perished, it’s better if her customers buy new ones, and she wants to have them available to sell). 

Enith knows that she has to fulfill certain requirements regarding the loan if she wants to borrow money in the future from Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: to buy patches, glue etc.

loans.name: Huaramaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “HUARAMAYA” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, está compuesta por seis integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Rogelia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: crianza de ganado vacuno, venta de leche, confección de polleras y mantas.

La señora Rogelia,  indica que es primera ves que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de leche que viene trabajando hace diez y seis año atrás, ya que es un negocio familiar.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital mediante la compra de una vaca lechera, que comprara de la feria de Villa Remedios y posteriormente lo procesado lo venderá a las empresas lecheras. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.
texts.en:
The Huramaya Communal Bank will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Cascada.  It is made up of six members and it is managed by a board of directors headed by Rogelia.  The communal bank's members have different businesses, among which we have the following: raising cattle, selling milk, and making skirts and blankets.

Rogelia tells that this is the first time she has worked with Pro Mujer, having joined on the invitation of a promoter.  Currently, she has a business selling milk that she has had for 16 years now since it's a family business.

The loan she is now taking out is to increase her capital through the purchase of a milk cow.  She will buy it at the Villa Remedios market and after processing it she will sell it to a dairy company.  This kind of work allows her to generate the resources to support her family as much as possible, as she is married and has four children.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
La señora Ángela es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 66 años D. edad, está casada y tiene cinco hijos mayores D. edad y con familia cada uno D. ellos.
Lleva 10 años trabajando con  los préstamos D. Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la confección y arreglo D. prendas D. vestir, que lo realiza mayormente en horas D. la tarD..
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: una maquina nueva semi industrial eléctrica, porque la que tiene es una  maquina antigua a pedal.
El trabajo que realiza es en su casa, se da tiempo para estar con su esposo que es el que le ayuda en la casa porque él se encarga D. la cocina mientras tenga costura que realizar.
Va seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos porque capacitan en temas muy importantes además D. los talleres para las socias que quieran aprender cosas nuevas.
texts.en:
Angela is a member of the Las Almendras Communal Bank from the Calleria District of the department of Ucayali.  She is 66 years old, married, and has five adult children, each of whom has their own family.

She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for 10 years.  Her profession is the sewing and repair of clothing, which she mainly does during the afternoon.

With her new loan of 2,000 nuevos soles she will buy a new semi-industrial electric sewing machine because the one she has is an old pedal sewing machine.

She does her work at home and she gives herself time to be with her husband, who is the one who helps around the house by taking care of the cooking when she has sewing to do.

She is going to continue to work with Manuela Ramos because they offer training on very important issues in addition to the workshops they offer for members who want to learn new things.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Olga Luz

texts.es:
La señora Olga es socia del banco comunal Las almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 35 años de edad, tres hijos, está casada y su esposo se desempeña como operador de maquinas pesadas.
Lleva trabajando cuatro años con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a la venta de mercaderías de uso personal, todo lo que son ropas, zapatos y carteras, negocio que viene realizando desde hace tiempo y que le da buenas ganancias.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos soles comprara: 6 pares de zapatos, 1 docena de camisas, 2 docenas de polos, 1 docena de pantalones, ½ docena de shores.
No es mucho lo que invierte solo trabaja con pedidos para traer la mercadería y entregarla inmediatamente, su hija mayor le ayuda a colocar/vender su mercadería.
Está muy contenta por que ahora tiene un negocio propio y se pone horarios para salir a realizar su cobranza y para atender su hogar.
texts.en:
Olga is a member of the communal bank Las Almendras in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 35 years old, has three children, and is married. Her husband works as a heavy machine operator.

She has been getting loans through Manuela Ramos for four years and works selling personal goods such as all types of clothing, shoes and handbags. Her business has been growing over time and is at present making good profits.

With this new loan of 2,000 soles she will buy 6 pairs of shoes, 1 dozen blouses, 2 dozen sport shirts, 1 dozen pair of pants, and 6 pairs of shorts.

It is not much of a risk because she buys and then immediately delivers, since she only takes orders. Her oldest daughter helps her find and sell the merchandise.

She is very happy because now she has her own business and she sets her hours working her own schedule and is able to take care of her house.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes for resale

loans.name: Sandra Marina

texts.es: La Joven Sandra Marina tiene 34 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa usada clasificada, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este tipo de negocio, sus ventas las realiza de Lunes a sábado, tiene clientes fijos que viven en colonias aledañas a su casa de habitacion, así mismo sale a vender sus productos a otras colonias,  vende la ropa al crédito y cobra en quince días, cerca de su casa hay un supermercado y las empleadas tambien son clientes de ella, el credito lo utilizara para comprar fardo de ropa usada clasificada, nos cuenta que gracias a los ingresos que ha recibido de su negocio a podido mantener a una sobrina que se la dejaron desde que tenia 6 meses y actualmente tiene 3 años de edad. Tiene muchos planes para su negocio.
texts.en: Sandra Marina is a young woman of 34 who sells used clothing.  She has been in this business for several years.  She makes her sales from Monday to Saturday and has regular customers who live in surrounding neighborhoods.  She also goes out to some neighborhoods to sell her products.  She sells her clothes on credit and collects payment every two weeks.  There is a supermarket near her home and the employees there are also customers of hers.  Sandra will use her loan to buy a bundle of sorted used clothing.  She tells us that, thanks to the income that she has made from her business, she has been able to support a niece who was left with her when she was six months old and is now three years old.  Sandra has many plans for her business.

loans.use: to buy a bundle of sorted used clothing

loans.name: Mirian Rosmilda

texts.es:
La señora Miriam es socia del banco comunal Las Almendras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 31 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.
Son tres años que viene integrando la familia de Manuela Ramos y se dedica a todo lo que son Manualidades, confecciona artículos de según la temporada.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,200.00 nuevos soles comprara: 6 pliegos de cartulinas, plumones delgados, plumones gruesos , 2 frascos de silicona, ¼ de escarcha de diferentes colores materiales para realizar los adornos para la temporada de navidad y lo está preparando con mucho tiempo de anticipación y tenga  una buena cantidad de adornos  en la fecha prevista.
Su trabajo lo realiza en su casa y le encanta, es muy creativa, tiene un buen gusto para  hacer los adornos, su esposo es ingeniero forestal y siempre sale a trabajar a otra ciudad.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por permitirle trabajar con los créditos que dan a las mujeres emprendedoras.
texts.en:
Miriam is a member of the "Las Almendras" community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 31 years old, married, and has two children.

Miriam has been a member of the Manuela Ramos family for three years.  Her business is making all kinds of handicrafts.  She makes items according to the season.

Miriam will use her new loan for 2,200 soles to buy 6 sheets of card, thin-tipped markers, thick-tipped markers, 2 jars of silicone, different colored glitter and other materials for making ornaments for the Christmas season.  She is preparing her items well in advance so that she has a good quantity of ornaments ready when the Christmas season comes.

Miriam works from home and she loves it.  She is very creative and has good taste for making ornaments.  Her husband is a forestry engineer and is always going to another city to work.

Miriam is grateful to Manuela Ramos for allowing her to work with the loans that they give entrepreneurial women.

loans.use: to buy materials (card, markers, silicone, etc.)

loans.name: Yuliney

texts.es: Yuliney de 20 años vive con su cónyuge y su hijo de 9 meses de edad al suroccidente de la Ciudad, allí tiene una papelería, vende servicios de telecomunicaciones vía celular e internet, además de ofrecer los servicios de juegos de play  Station  y la venta de dulces.  Yuliney se dedicó desde niña al estudio y logró terminar una carrera técnica pero no encontró un empleo para desempeñarse,  por eso hace dos años, se dedicó al negocio actual, del que hoy genera ingresos y apoya a su familia. Su sueño más adelante es lograr que su hijo obtenga una educación, donde pueda desempeñarse exitosamente y por eso se esmera en trabajar al lado de su cónyuge día a día. Mientras esto ocurre rota  sus inventarios cada 14 días y tiene una rentabilidad promedia, no menor del 41,49%,  desde la que planea incrementar su capital. En la actualidad está aplicando a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que recibe de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará dulcería, un computador, 1 televisor, un juego de play Station, y tendrá éxito porque se acerca una época de gran demanda en la cual programa darse a conocer aún más en el sector.
texts.en: Yuliney is 20 years old and she lives with her common-law partner and her 9-month old child. They live in the south-west of the city and she has there an school supply store from where she also sells telecommunications services via cellular phone and internet, Play Station gaming services, and sweets sales. Yuliney attended school since she was a girl and she managed to accomplish a technical career but she could not find employment. This is why two year ago she started up her current business. Today she generates and income and she is able to support her family. Her dream for the future is to send her son to school where he will apply himself successfully, which is the reason why she strives to work alongside her partner day after day. While this develops she has an inventory rotation of 14 days and she has an average profit of no less than 41.49%, which she hopes to increase with her capital. Currently she is investing her Kiva loan, the first loan she receives from Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo (Kiva Field Partner). She will purchase sweets, a computer, a television, and a Play Station game. She will be successful because the season when she sees the greatest demand approaches and she will strive to make herself even better known in her sector.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, a computer, a television, and a Play Station game.

loans.name: Santos Celis

texts.es:
Don Santos tiene 59 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos.

Él vive en una zona rural y su única diversión es el trabajo, es una persona luchadora y humilde que desde niño se dedico al trabajo de campo, por eso tiene una amplia experiencia y le satisface lo que hace, trabaja 8 horas diarias con el único fin de tener lo necesario.

Don Santos compra  los fertilizantes en una tienda situada a un kilómetro de su casa, el los compra y paga por que se los lleven a su casa, una vez los fertilizantes estén en su casa él los carga en la espalda durante 1.5 kilómetros hasta llegar al terreno donde tiene sus cultivos, ya que para llegar ahí no hay acceso de vehículos.

Él solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes,  para terminar de cosechar la milpa que tiene sembrada desde mayo, que por el motivo de las lluvias abundantes se esta perdiendo. Con esto él podrá comprar todos los insumos de una sola vez y podrá recuperar la cosecha que se le esta perdiendo.

De esta manera podrá tener el alimento para su familia, ya que él ha pasado momentos difíciles y no quiere que sus hijos pasen por lo mismo. Santos desea que sus hijos estén sanos y que por medio de su trabajo logre educarlos y que se puedan ganar la vida de otra forma, ya con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Santos is 59 years old and he lives with is life partner and their three children. 

He lives in a rural region and his only diversion is his work. He is a fighter and he is humble. Since he was a boy he has dedicated himself to working the land, which is when he has ample experience and he enjoys what he does. He works 8 hours per day and his only goal is to acquire what they need.

Santos buys the fertilizers from a store located one kilometer from his house. He buys and pays for the delivery all the way to his house. Once the fertilizers are at home with him he carries them on his back for 1.5 kilometers to his farmland. To get to his land there is no vehicle access.

He requests a loan to invest in the purchase of fertilizers to conclude his corn plantation that he started out in the month of May. Given the abundant rains the harvest is failing. with this he will be able to purchase all of the materials at once and he will be able to recover the harvest which is currently failing.

This way he will be able to secure nutrition for his family. He is experiencing difficult times and he doesn't want for his children to go through the same. Santos wants for his children to be healthy, and through his work, to send them to school in order to earn a living in a different way, by using their education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for his cultivation.

loans.name: Edgardo Jose

texts.es: Con su credikiva anterior Edgardo compró cueros sintéticos goma, suelas y herrajes,con ello le fue muy bien y ahora planea adquirir una máquina industrial para fabricar bolsos, y materias primas para producir sandalias, zapatos, bolsos y correas. "Estoy muy agradecido  por la ayuda prestada que tnto beneficio ha traido a mi negocio y a mi familia. "
texts.en:
With his previous loan, Edgardo bought synthetic leather, rubber, soles, and buckles. He has done very well and now plans to acquire an industrial machine for making handbags and materials for producing sandals, shoes, purses, and belts.

Edgardo says, “I am very grateful for the help that has been given to me because it has benefited my business and my family.”

loans.use: to acquire an industrial machine for making handbags and materials for producing sandals, shoes, purses, and belts.

loans.name: Lourdes Narcisa

texts.es:
Lourdes de 51 años, es una mujer independiente, responsable en su trabajo y más que todo respetuosa.
Es una empleada domestica, su actividad la realiza sola.

La dificultad de ella es cuando le da gripe, los dueños de casa no le permiten trabajar a ella cuando tiene gripe. Tiene una relación de unión libre, su conjugue es taxista.

Ella solicita el préstamo para el mejoramiento de su vivienda. Su sueño es terminar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Lourdes, age 51, is an independent woman who is responsible in her work. Above all, she is respectful. She works as a housekeeper, a job that she performs alone.

One difficulty that she must deal with is whenever she comes down with the flu. Her employer will not allow her to work when she is sick. Lourdes is in a common-law relationship and her partner is a taxi driver.

She is requesting a home improvement loan. Her dream is to finish the construction of her house.

loans.use: to buy paint, cement, and sand for completing the construction of her house.

loans.name: Mapit Sartasiñani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MAPIT SARTASIÑANI” iniciará el decimoquinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Germán Busch.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora  Bertha.   Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de comida, comercio de frutas, novedades (guantes y ganchos), artesanía en ropa, comercio de fruta, tienda de barrio, venta de coca, aceitería.
 
La señora Bertha indica que hace dos años que integra una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su sobrina. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de artículos de ocasión (venta por temporada) que viene trabajando hace cuarenta años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de su madre.

El crédito que sacará ahora es para el aumento de capital (compra de artículos varios) los que compra de Oruro y posteriormente lo en las ferias de forma ambulante (sin puesto fijo). Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las reuniones y el préstamo.

En la fotografia no se encuentra la señora Isabel, ya que tuvo consulta médica.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Mapit Sartasiñani” is starting its fifteenth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Germán Busch Community Center. The group has eight members who are led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Bertha. The members of this Communal Bank engage in different businesses in order to get ahead such as selling food, selling fruit, selling novelties (gloves and hair pins), producing handmade clothing, managing a neighborhood store, selling coca leaves, and producing cooking oil.

Sra. Bertha says that she joined a Communal Bank with Pro Mujer two years ago after receiving a invitation from her niece. She currently has a business selling seasonal merchandise. Bertha has been in this business for 40 years and learned the trade from her mother.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her capital for buying different goods in Oruro that she will eventually sell at the fairs as a traveling merchant (she does not have a fixed location). Working in this manner allows her to generate income to support her family as much as possible. Bertha is in a common-law relationship and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Bertha says she enjoys the meetings and the loans. In the photograph, Sra. Isabel is not present because she had an appointment at the health clinic.

loans.use: to buy seasonal goods for resale.

loans.name: Clara Del Rocio

texts.es:
Clara de  34 años, vive en una zona periurbana llamada el “fortín”. Su negocio es una tienda-papeleria ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda. 

Empezó con esta actividad haces 12  años,  ya que tenía poco capital ella pensaba ponerse otra clase de negocio, en la actualidad le va  bien con este negocio. 

Su  trabajo lo realiza sola, el horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 8:00am hasta las 20:00pm.
No tiene dificultad, es soltera. Tienen 2 hijos uno de 3 y el otro de 7 años,  estudian  en escuelas públicas.

Solicita este préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: papeleria, bebidas, aceites etc. 
Su sueño es mejorar  su casa de cemento y agrandar muchos más su negocio y poder ayudar a sus hijos para que terminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Clara is 34 years old and lives in a periurban district called Fortín. Her business consists of a general store and stationery shop located in the front part of her home. She started this business 12 years ago. With the little bit of capital that she had, Clara added another type of business and is now doing well. She works alone Monday through Sunday, from 8am to 8pm. Clara has not had any difficulties. She is single and has two children, a three-year-old and a seven-year-old who attends public school.

Clara is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as stationery, beverages, oil, and other products. Her dream is to make improvements to her cement house and expand her business as much as possible so that she can help her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy stationery, beverages, oil, and other products.

loans.name: Maricela Mercedes

texts.es:
Maricela de 34 años, una mujer que a pesar de ser soltera trata de seguir adelante con sus hijos. 
Su negocio es la venta de algodón, empezó esta actividad haces muchos años con su hermano, iniciaron este negocio con un capital bajo.
Actualmente le va yendo muy bien gracias a la voluntad de Dios.
Ella solicita este préstamo para el incremento de su negocio y para la compra de ingredientes como: azúcar y colorantes vegetal.  
El sueño de ella es hacer su casa de cemento y poder sacar a sus hijos adelante.
texts.en:
Maricela is 34 years old and she is a woman who strives to move forward with her children despite being single. Her business is the sale of cotton candy. She started out her business several years ago when she and her brother decided to start it out with a small capital fund.

It is going very well for her thanks to the Will of God. She requests this loan to increase her business and to purchase ingredients, such as: sugar and vegetable food colors.

Her dream is to rebuild her house with cement and to move her children forward.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as sugar and vegetable food coloring.

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es:
Miriam de 51 años, una mujer trabajadora que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio.
Su negocio es una librería en la cual la ha surtido con varias mercaderías como: bebidas, galletas, etc.
El horario de ella es de lunes a domingo, desde las 8:00am hasta las 20:00pm.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio y para la compra de mercadería como: bebidas, galletas, entre otros.
Su sueño es que su negocio incremente y donde pueda brindar empleo a los necesitados.
texts.en:
Miriam, age 51, is a hardworking woman who has aspirations of growing her business. She has a store that is stocked with different merchandise such as beverages, cookies, and other products. Her work schedule is Monday through Sunday, from 8am to 8pm.

Miriam is requesting a loan to invest in her business. She will buy merchandise such as beverages, cookies, and other items. Her dream is to increase her business so that she can provide jobs to those who need them.

loans.use: to buy beverages, cookies, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for his taxi.

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
La señora Ruth, es madre soltera, vive en casa propiedad de un hermano, convive con sus tres hijos: una hija de 19 años que estudia un técnico en agente de ventas, otra hija de 16 años que estudia bachillerato y un hijo de 12 años que cursa el quinto grado de básica.

Por tradición familiar se dedican a comprar y engordar cerdos, estos los compran pequeños, los engordan y los venden cuando ya son grandes. Esta actividad la realiza en un espacio del terreno de su casa. Debido a las exigencias económicas de su familia y a que el negocio de engordar cerdos no le permitían obtener ingresos constantes, desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de joyas enchapadas y productos cosméticos por catalogo. Esta actividad le ha permitido a su familia que viva dignamente y puedan realizar sus estudios.

Para alimentar los cerdos, ella compra suero que sale de la leche de vaca cuando se procesa, esta la compra todos los días a procesadores de lácteos de la zona y el concentrado lo compra en la ciudad que esta ubicada a 25 kilómetros de su vivienda. Para transpórtalos hace uso de los autobuses, luego paga un pick up para que le lleve el producto hasta su casa de donde la deja el bus. Las compras las realiza una vez a la semana, debido a que si compra mucho el producto pierde su calidad. Las joyas y los cosméticos también los compra en la ciudad.

Ella solicita un préstamo para continuar engordando a 20 cerdos que tienen mes y medio de edad, alimentar 2 cerdas parinderas y un berraco (macho) y la otra parte para comprar productos nuevos para la venta. Esto le permitirá a ruth continuar con sus actividades para generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia y no deje de trabajar con las joyas y los cosméticos que son los que le generan un flujo constante a su familia.

Ruth desea a mediano plazo apoyar a sus hijos para que estudien una carrera técnica y se puedan defender por su propia cuenta, también quiere construir instalaciones adecuadas para el engorde de los cerdos, y construir una casa en la propiedad que le heredo su mamá, ya que actualmente vive en casa de un hermano.
texts.en:
Ruth is a single mother and she lives in a house that is owned by her brother. She lives with her three children: a 19-year old daughter who is studying commerce at a technical school; another daughter, 16 years old who is in high school. And a 12-year old son who is in grade five.

As a family tradition they buy and raise pigs. They are purchased as piglets and they raise them and sell them when they have grown. She carries out her business from a space on the property. Given the financial needs of her family and the fact that raising pigs does not permit them to have a steady source of income, she decided 8 years ago to sell fashion jewelry and cosmetics by catalogue. This business has permitted her family to live in a dignified manner and to send her children to school.

To feed her pigs, she buys the whey that is produced from cow milk when it is processed. And she busy every day from the daily producers in the region. The concentrated feed is purchased from the city, located 25 kilometers from her home. She uses public buses to transport her products and then she pays a pick-up truck service to take her products all the way to her house from the bus stop. She makes her purchases once per week, especially because the product loses its quality if bought in larger volumes. The jewelry and the cosmetics are also purchased in the city.

She requests a loan to keep raising her 20 pigs, which are 6 weeks old. She needs to feed her sows and a boar. The other part of her loan will be used to purchase more and new products for resale. This will let Ruth continue with her income generating activities for the support of her family. She must not stop selling the jewelry and cosmetics because they generate the constant source of income for the family.

Ruth wishes to support her children in the medium-long term, so that they will earn a technical career and so that they will earn themselves a living. She also wants to build adequate barns for the pigs and to build a house that was inherited to her by her mother. She currently lives in her brother's house.

loans.use: to purchase feed to raise her pigs, and to purchase fashion jewelry and cosmetics.

loans.name: Urania Marbelly

texts.es:
Doña Urania, sigue con las ventas de ropa, zapatos, cosmeticos, en donde ha venido creciendo  gracias a sus ventas altas, el cual lo ha logrado, saliendo mas a la calle y ofreciendo sus productos, asi como ha tenido mas encargo de ropa.anque sea cansado, pero es dinero seguro.
Su esposo lo apoya, ya que tambien trabaja en el comercio, ayuda  a sus tres hijos para que tengan una mejor educacion y lograr que culminen en un futuro, ya que ellos no tuvieron la oportunidad de terminar sus estudios.
Con este nuevo financiamiento, invertira en compra de ropa, zapatos, cosmeticos por docena y  seis pares de chinela, el cual son demandado por sus clientes, por ser de aprecios accesibles, a su cliente de trayectorias les da al credito dando la confianza asi como la instutucion le da la oportunidad de crecer en inventario, mediante los prestamos.
texts.en:
Urania continues to sell clothing, shoes, and cosmetics and her business has increased thanks to heightened sales. She has accomplished this by setting out to the streets selling her products more often. This is how she has received more orders for clothing. It is tiring work but it is a steady income. Her husband supports her and he also works in commerce. He helps their three children to have a better education and to achieve a future for themselves. They did not have the opportunity to finish their schooling.

This new loan will be invested in the purchase of clothing, shoes, and cosmetics by the dozens and six pairs of slippers. These have been in demand by her clients given the accessible prices. She offers her customers the ability to pay on credit, as does the institution to help her increase her inventory, through loans.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Amistad Group

texts.es:
La Sr. MARTHA, de 43 años de edad casada, tiene 1 hijo menor de edad  de 8 años  en etapa escolar, mujer luchadora  por salir adelante  frente a los obstáculos  que se les presenta en  la vida, socia de la alcancía comunal “Amistad”, se le renovó el préstamo ya que  en el ciclo anterior demostró puntualidad y responsabilidad en  sus pagos.
Ella se dedica en la actualidad a la confección bordados de fustanes  de vestimentas  típicas de la región. El Préstamo solicitó  para la  compra de materiales como hilos, telas, etc. En el futuro desea exportar los  fustanes al exterior del  país donde,  así  incrementar más sus ingresos y poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida  a su familia.
La clienta está ubicada  parte superior de la fotografía vestida con ropa color celeste.
texts.en:
Martha is 43 year old.  She is married and has an 8 year old child who attends school. She is a woman who struggles to get ahead in the face of life’s obstacles.  She is a member of the Amistad Communal Bank.  She is renewing her loan as she demonstrated punctuality and responsibility in her last loan cycle.

Currently, she embroiders petticoats for the traditional clothing worn in the  region.  She is requesting the loan to purchase thread, fabric, and other materials.  In the future, she wishes to export the petticoats out of the country. This will enable her to increase her income and provide a better quality of life for her family.

The client is located in the upper part of the photograph, dressed in sky blue clothing.

loans.use: purchase thread and fabric for the embroidery of petticaots.

loans.name: Properidad2 Group

texts.es:
L. A.C. “PROPERIDAD2” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Cascada, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por L. señora Basilia. Los negocios que las integrantes D. L. asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta D. comida, venta D. legía, macramé, venta D. plásticos, venta D. carne D. ovejas y D. cordero.

L. señora Basilia,  indica que es primera ves que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación D. una promotora. En L. actualidad elL. tiene un negocio D. venta D. comida que viene trabajando hace tres año atrás.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra D. aceite, arroz, fideo, etc.) que adquirirá D. L. feria D. L. Ceja y posteriormente elaborado lo venderá en las ferias. Esta forma D. trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues elL. es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta D. Pro Mujer, elL. responD. que le gusta L. capacitación D. crédito y salud.
texts.en:
The Prosperidad2 Communal Bank will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer.  The group is part the Cascada Center and is comprised of seven members. They have a board of directors, headed by Basilia.  The members of the communal bank are engaged in varied businesses. They sell food, bleach, macramé crafts, and plastic products, as well as sheep and lamb meat. 

Basilia states that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer, which she joined at the invitation of a promoter.  Currently, she is engaged in food sales and has been working in this business for the past three years.  

The purpose of the current loan is to increase her working capital in order to  purchase oil, rice, noodles, etc.   She will acquire these products from the market in L. Ceja, prepare the meals, and sell them later at the markets.  Basilia is unmarried and has two children, so this type of work enables her to generate income to support her family. 

When asked what she liked about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the loan training and the health benefits.

loans.use: to purchase rice, noodles, oil, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
El señor Wilfredo tiene 48 años de edad y es talabartero, elabora Fajas, sandalias, llaveros, monturas de caballos, todos estos productos elaborados a base de cuero genuino, sus productos los vende en distintos departamentos de todo el pais, como ser Olancho, Comayagua, Choluteca y Danli, tiene varios clientes que le hacen pedidos grandes,  cuenta con dos empleados para la elaboracion de sus productos, gracias a las ganancias que le genera su negocio ha logrado graduar a sus hijos y tambien realizarle mejoras a su vivienda.
don Wilfredo es bien carismático y amable, se le nota que le gusta su trabajo, sus productos son de buena calidad y con diseños para todos los gustos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de cuero, hebillas, broches y pegamento.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is 48 years. He is a leather craftsman.  He makes belts, sandals, keyrings, and horse saddles.  All of these products are made from genuine leather.  His products are sold in various departments around the country including Olancho, Comayagua, Choluteca y Danli.  He has various customers who place large orders.  He has two employees who make his products.  Thanks to the profits generated by his business, his sons have graduated from school and he is also making improvements to his home.  Wilfredo  is very charismatic and friendly.  He notes that he likes his work, and his products are of good quality and designed for all tastes.
The loan will be used to buy leather, buckles, fasteners, and glue.

loans.use: to purchase leather, buckles, fasteners, and glue.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan hombre humilde, trabajador, comerciante, su compañera de vida trabaja para una empresa privada, siendo un ingreso mas. Su proyecto es mejorar su nivel de vida mediante las utilidades obtenidas del negocio.
Su negocio consiste en brindar el servicio de entretenimiento de billares y a su vez ofrece comida, fritanga, bebida entre otros productos. 
Al quedar sin trabajo hace un tiempo atrás siendo una dificulta para sobrevivir, se le presento la oportunidad de iniciar con su negocio, siendo su mayor fuente de ingreso económico que hasta este tiempo le ha permitido ir mejorando la infraestructura de su vivienda. Con el préstamo solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de construcción: cemento, bloques, hierro, estribu, arena, piedrines, alambré amarre, clavos, tablones de madera. Para levantar la pared del costado sur de su vivienda y colocarle el piso en donde está el negocio ya que es de tierra perjudicando la salud de sus clientes y de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is a humble man and a hardworking businessman.  His life partner works for a private business, this being additional income.

His project is to improve his quality of life with the profits obtained from his business.  His business is the entertainment service of billiards, and at the same time he offers food, fried snacks, drinks, and other products.

When being without work some time ago made it difficult to survive, the opportunity of starting his business came up.  This is a greater source of economic income that, up to now, has allowed him to work on improving the infrastructure of his home.

He will use the requested loan to buy construction materials: cement, cinderblocks, iron, rods, sand, gravel, wire, nails, and wood planks.  He will build the south wall of his house and put in the floor for the business, since it's made of dirt, which is detrimental to the health of his customers and his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Carmen Delia

texts.es:
La Señora. Carmen es socia del banco comunal María Reina de la Paz, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una belleza que encanta a sus visitantes, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999, la cultura de su gente y las tradiciones de sus pueblos la hacen aun mas encantadora, su variedad en la gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

La Señora Carmen tiene 38 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos  de 23, 20, 16 y 14 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos trabajan para sus gastos personales y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar, sus dos últimos hijos están estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
La Señora. Carmen se dedica a la venta de bisutería, actividad que la desempeña hace 8 meses y solo en sus tiempos libres ya que trabaja cuidando a una niña hace un año de lunes a viernes todo el día.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de bisutería para continuar en esta actividad.
 
Su sueño es  tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the María Reina de la Paz Community Bank. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city whose beauty charms its visitors, and which has been a cultural heritage site since 1999. The culture of its people and the traditions of its villages make it even more charming, and the variety of food captivates the palates of its residents and visitors.

Carmen is 38 years old, divorced, and with four children from her previous marriage. Her children are 23, 20, 16 and 14 years old. Her two older children work to support themselves and help her with the expenses of the home, and her younger two children are studying at the local high school. She does not have her own home but rents a place.

Carmen works selling costume jewelry, and has been doing so for 8 months. She only does this during her free time as she has spent the last year providing daycare for a girl from Monday to Friday.

She joined the community bank three years ago and will use this new loan to invest in the purchase of costume jewelry to continue with this business. Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: buy costume jewelry

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
La  señora Valentina tiene 53 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene poco tiempo de haber iniciado con su negocio, el cual lo abre de lunes a domingo y los sabados temprano elabora y vende Donas, las que vende en las pulperías y a sus vecinos, sus hijas le ayudan con el negocio ya que va dos veces por semana al mercado para la compra de abarroteria y granos basicos, doña Valentina es muy amable y se nota que le gusta mucho lo que hace, es trabajadora y trata que su producto sea de buena calidad. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria y granos basicos.
gracias a su negocio y al apoyo que le brinda su esposo ha logrado educar a sus hijas y hacerle mejoras a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Valentina is 53 years old and works selling everyday products.  It wasn't too long ago that she started her business, which she opens from Monday through Sunday, and early on Saturdays.  She makes and sells doughnuts, which she sells in grocery stores and to her neighbors.  Her daughters help her with the business since twice a week she goes to the market to buy groceries and basic grains.

Valentina is very nice and you can tell that she likes what she does very much.  She is hardworking and tries to make sure she has a high-quality product.

She will use the loan to buy groceries and basic grains.

Thanks to her business and her husband's support, Valentina has been able to educate her children and make improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, coffee, sugar, salt, eggs, lard, oil, margarine, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Armando Jose

texts.es:
Don Armando de profesion albañil, cada dia sigue trabajando para el bienestar comun, sus trabajos los hace por contrato, y cuando termina busca rumbo en el vecindario,  y cuando no encuentra, su esposa lo apoya, ya que ella trabaja en servicio domestico, su hijo sigue cursando el año escolar.
Como objetivo ha sido la mejora a su casa, el cual la va construyendo toda de concreto, esta feliz, por poder dar  a su familia, un techo digno y con mayor seguridad. Va por parte ya que su liquidez es poca por que tiene que pagar los otros gastos familiar.
Con el credito anterior, logro la terminacion de baños e inodoro, condicion que vino a mejorar la higiene, ahora con este nuevo prestamo podra comenzar la pared de concreto frontal y lateral, dejando una mejor vision, y seguridad.
texts.en:
Armando is a mason by trade, and works every day for for the common good. He provides contracted labor, and when he finishes, he looks for new work in the neighborhood. If he doesn't find any, his wife supports him. She works in domestic service. Their son is studying at school.

His goal has been to improve his house, and he is building it all of concrete. He is happy to be able to give his family a dignified home with greater security. He works on it in portions as he does not have much extra money after paying for the other household expenses.

With his previous loan, he was able to finish the bathrooms and toilet and improve their hygiene. With this loan, he will be able to start the front and side concrete walls, creating a better appearance of his home and improving security.

loans.use: build front and side concrete walls to have greater security at his house.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La señora Ana Maria esta casada y es madre de dos hijos,  Ana se dedica a la venta de lacteos y abarroteria en general, sus clientes son los vecinos y amigos, tambien los pescadores que desde muy temprano vienen a comprarle, ellos se preparan con alimentos para comenzar su faena diaria, doña Ana es muy amigable y se considera una mujer muy trabajadora y de buenos principios. 
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lacteos y abarroteria ya que desea surtir un poco más su pulpería.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is married and the mother of two children. Ana sells dairy products and general groceries. Her clients are neighbors and friends as well as fishermen who go to buy from her very early. They prepare to do their jobs by buying food. Ana is very friendly and considers herself to be a hardworking woman with good principles.  

She will use the loan to buy dairy products and merchandise to stock her small store.

loans.use: to buy milk, cheese, butter, cottage cheese, ham, bologna, chicken, beef and pork, juice, churros, beans, rice, sugar and lard.

loans.name: María Narcisa De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal María Reina de la Paz, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una belleza que encanta a sus visitantes, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999, la cultura de su gente y las tradiciones de sus pueblos la hacen aun mas encantadora, su variedad en la gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

Doña María tiene 45 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 23, 14 y 12 años de edad, su primer hijo está estudiando en la universidad y sus dos últimos hijos en el colegio. La casa en la que habita es de su propiedad. 

La Señora. María es comerciante, ella se dedica  a la venta de cosméticos de la marca Yanbal y Avon, esta actividad la desempeña hace 6 meses sin horario ni día fijo.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 14 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir para la compra de cosméticos para tener un mayor surtido.
 
Su meta es tener un negocio más grande como un bazar.
texts.en:
María is a member of María Reina de la Paz Communal Bank.  She lives in Cuenca, a beautiful city that visitors love and that has been a World Heritage Site since 1999.  The culture of the people of Cuenca and the traditions of its communities make it even more charming.  Its gastronomic variety captivates the palate of locals and visitors.

María, 45, is divorced and has three children from her marriage, ages 23, 14, and 12.  Her oldest child is studying in the university and the other two are in high school.  The house in which she lives is her own.

María is a businesswoman.  She sells Yanbal and Avon cosmetics.  She has been doing this work for six months without a set schedule.

She has been a member of the communal bank for 14 years, and she's going to invest her current loan in buying cosmetics to have a bigger supply.
 
Her goal is to have a larger business, like a store.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria Azucena

texts.es:
María casada, su esposo taxista, sus hijos estudiantes de secundaria, trabaja para un laboratorio como empacadora desde hace un tiempo. Sus planes son mejorar poco a poco la infraestructura de su vivienda. También tiene como otros ingresos el alquiler de cuartos. 
Con el préstamo comprara materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, piedrín, láminas de zinc, ladrillos, barrillas para soldar, perlines, entre otros materiales. Que serán utilizados en el cambio de los perlines de madera por los perlines de hierro, así también el cambiar el techo que está en mal estado que se le pasa el agua, el repecho de las paredes y colocación de ladrillos ya que su suelo es embaldosado. Al realizar estas mejoras obtendrá comodidad, seguridad ante cualquier desastre y prevenir enfermedades. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo de lograr unas de sus metas y la oportunidad del crédito. Siendo de gran impacto de cambio en su vida.
texts.en:
María is married and her husband is a taxi driver. Her children are in secondary school. She has worked for a laboratory as a packer for some time. Her plans are to improve the infrastructure of her house. She also has other income from renting rooms. 
 
With the loan, she will buy construction materials such as: cement, sand, gravel, zinc sheeting, bricks, rods for welding, metal beams and more. These will be used to replace the wooden beams with the iron ones as well as replace the roof, which is in such poor condition that water is coming through. The walls will be re-plastered and bricks put down on the floor because her floor now is slab. With these improvements, she will have comfort, security against disasters and disease prevention. She is She is thankful to the bank for its support in achieving one of her goals. This will have a big impact and change her life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and do some home improvements.

loans.name: Lucia Jacqueline

texts.es:
La Señora. Lucia es socia del banco comunal María Reina de la Paz, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que tiene una belleza que encanta a sus visitantes, es patrimonio cultural de la humanidad desde 1999, la cultura de su gente y las tradiciones de sus pueblos la hacen aun mas encantadora, su variedad en la gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños.

La Señora. Lucia tiene 34 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 10, 8, 6, 4 y 1 año de edad, sus tres primeros hijos estudian en la escuela. Su esposo labora como mecánico industrial en su taller, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros pero independientemente.

Doña Lucia se dedica a la  cría y venta de pollos y lleva 2 años en esta labor. También vende ropa, zapatos y perfumes hace 8 años y los fines de semana trabaja como mesera.
  
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su segundo crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos.
 
Su meta es terminar su casa ya que se encuentra en construcción.
texts.en:
Señora Lucia is a member of the communal bank Maria Reina de la Paz. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city whose beauty enchants its visitors. It has been a World Heritage site since 1999. The culture of its people and the traditions of its towns make it even more enchanting. Its gastronomic variety captivates the palates of its own people and of strangers.

Señora Lucia is 34 years old. She is married and has five children, ages 10, 8, 6, 4, and 1. Her three oldest children are in school. Her husband works as an industrial mechanic in his workshop. They do not have their own house, so they live in the house of her in-laws, but they live independently.

Doña Lucia raises and sells chickens. She has had this business for two years. She also sells clothing, shoes and perfumes, and she has been in this business for eight years. On weekends she works as a waitress.

This will be her second loan from the communal bank, and she is going to invest it in the purchase of chickens.

Her goal is to finish her house, which is now in construction.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Maria Elemena

texts.es:
La señora Maria Elemena radica en la ladea altos de la flor, tiene casa propia y vive con sus tres nietos, Maria se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene un negocio de pulpería en su casa de habitacion, ahi vende productos como ser: granos básicos, manteca, aceite, frijoles, azucar, papel, candelas, refrescos, churros, pan, galletas, cafe, arroz, pastillas, plantanos, huevos, aceite, sopas, pastas, salsas, condimentos, baterias, etc.
Maria también tiene un molino de moler maiz y tambien presta dichos servicios.
doña Maria es una mujer trabajadora y con deseos de superarse, el credito lo utilizara para la compra de una vaca lechera ya que ella compra leche y la procesa convirtiéndola en mantequilla y cuajada, con dicha vaca lechera dejara de comprar leche y asi los costos de la produccion de mantequilla y cuajada seran menos y obtendra mas ganancias cuando venda la mantequilla y la cuajada.
texts.en:
Maria Elemena in the town of Altos de la Flor. She has her own house and lives with her three grandchildren. Maria sells products of daily consumption. She has a small grocery store business in her house. She sells products such as : basic grains, lard, oil, beans, sugar, paper, candles, beverages, churros, bread, cookies, coffee, rice, pills, eggs, oil, soup, pasta, sauces, batteries, etc.  

Maria also has a corn mill and offers that service. Maria is a hardworking woman who wants to get ahead. She will use the loan to buy a dairy cow since she buys milk and processes it to make butter and cheese curd. With the dairy cow, she will stop buying milk and the productions costs for milk and cheese curd will be lower and she will have more profit when she sells the butter and cheese curd.

loans.use: to buy cow's milk.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es:
Doña  Maria tiene 41 años de edad, vive en la Aldea el Zapote y se dedica a la cria de cerdos, su negocio lo  tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion, Maria desea estar preparada para la epoca de navidad que es cuando mas se venden los cerdos enteros, desea comprar cerdos para tenernos bien gorditos y asi dentro de dos meses venderlos y obtener buenas ganancias.
Maria en sus tiempos libres  visita la iglesia de su comunidad.
texts.en:
María, 41, lives in Aldea El Zapote and works raising pigs.  Her business is at her house.

María wants to be prepared for the Christmas season, which is when whole pigs are most in demand.  She wants to buy pigs to have them really fat and sell them within two months to make a good profit.

María likes to visit the church in her community in her spare time.

loans.use: to buy pigs and pig feed.

loans.name: Silvia Lorena

texts.es:
Doña Silvia tiene 33 años de edad y tiene una pulperia, ahi vende todo tipo de abarroteria, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitacion en el caserio San Bernardo, Namasigue. Silvia se levanta todos los dias a las 5 de la mañana para atender su fiel clientela.  Silvia es madre de 2 hijos los cuales los tiene estudiando en el centro educativo de la comunidad.

juntos con su esposo trabajan duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos.
en sus tiempos libres Silvia cria gallinas.
texts.en:
Silvia is 33 years old and she has a small grocery store. She sells all kinds of grocery items. Her business is located in her home in the small town of San Bernardo, Namasique. Silvia gets up every day at 5:00 in the morning to tend to her loyal customers. Silvia is mother to 2 small children. They are studying in the local school in the community.
 
She and her husband work hard together to help their children get ahead. 

In her free time, Silvia raises chickens.

loans.use: to buy beans, tortillas, flour, eggs, soft drinks, juices, sugar, coffee, bread, dairy products, oatmeal, cereals, toilet paper, sanitary napkins, candies, chips, soups, pastas, and soaps

loans.name: Maria Enriqueta

texts.es: La señora María Enriqueta es una mujer emprendedora que le gusta el oficio del negocio, el cual se dedica a la venta de accesorios que ella misma elabora para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Hace 6 años el esposo adquirió una vivienda de interés social donde actualmente viven,   por una u otra cosa no han podido realizarle mejoras, por tal motivo solicita de un préstamo para comenzar un cuarto en la parte de enfrente para extender su sala comedor y hacer mas amplio uno de las recamaras. Para realizar su proyecto necesita comprar cemento, varilla, arena y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Señora Maria Enriqueta is an entrepreneurial woman who likes the duties of her business, which is selling accessories that she herself makes in order to help her husband with the household expenses. Six years ago her husband acquired a house in publicly subsidized housing where they now live. For one reason or another, they have not been able to make improvements, and for this reason she is applying for a loan to begin building a room at the front of the house to extend the dining room and enlarge one of the bedrooms. To carry out this project, she needs to buy cement, reinforcing rods, and sand and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand and pay for labor.

loans.name: Arcelia

texts.es: La señora Arcelia y su esposo son una pareja estable que ya tienen varios años de casados, que con ahorros formaron su propio patrimonio. La casa donde viven ya tiene 20 años a la cual le han ido haciendo mejoras para que permanezca en buenas condiciones. En este momento Arcelia no cuenta con el capital necesario para reparar las paredes y pintar de un color a su gusto para dar mejor aspecto. Para que Arcelia realice su proyecto necesita comprar pintura, cemento y arena.
texts.en: Arcelia and her husband are a stable couple that have been married for several years. They used their own savings to build their assets. The house where they live is 20 years old and they have been making improvements to it so that it will remain in good condition. At this moment, Arcelia doesn’t have the capital necessary to repair the walls and paint them a color she likes to make them look better. In order for Arcelia to finish her project, she needs paint, cement, and sand.

loans.use: to buy paint, cement, and sand

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Ii Group

texts.es:
La Sr. N.
de 44años  edad madre soltera con 01 hijo menor de edad  de 15 años  en etapa escolar, mujer luchadora  por salir adelante  frente a los obstáculos  que se les presenta en  la vida,socia de la alcancía comunal "virgen de Rosarios II"

tiene  Restaurantes  Marino Ceviche prepara platos a base de carnes de pescado.  El Préstamo solicitó  para la  compra de mesas, sillas, cubiertos, etc.  Así  poder incrementar más sus ingresos y poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida  a su familia.
La clienta está ubicada tercera lado izquierdo co ropa color verde.
texts.en:
N. is 44 years old and a single mother with 1 minor son, aged 15 who is still in school. She is a mother who struggles to get ahead while faced with the obstacles life can present. N. is a member of the “Virgen de Rosario II” communal bank.

N. has a seafood and ceviche restaurant and prepares seafood dishes. She is soliciting this loan to buy tables, chairs, tableware, etc. Thus, she will be able to increase her income in hopes of offering a better quality of life for her family.

In the photo, N. is located on the left in the 3rd row, wearing green clothes.

loans.use: buy supplies for her seafood restaurant, which specializes in ceviche.

loans.name: Constantina

texts.es: La señora Constantina es una mujer dedicada al hogar y al bienestar de sus hijos. La casa donde actualmente vive es de interés social que compro su esposo, con el fin de no pagar renta y tener su propio patrimonio. La casa es muy pequeña por tal motivo Constantina quiere que se construya un cuarto en la parte de enfrente para que viva mas cómoda la familia.  Para que el cuarto se construya se necesita comprar material de construcción como, arena, varilla, cemento y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Constantina is a woman who is dedicated to her home and to the well-being of her children. The house where she now lives is a social interest house that her husband bought so they wouldn’t have to pay rent and would have their own assets. The house is very small, which is why Constantina needs to build a room in the front part of the house, so that the family can live more comfortably. In order to build the room, she needs to buy construction materials, such as sand, rebar, and cement and pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to build a room

loans.name: Pura Concepción

texts.es: La señora Pura Concepción es una mujer muy trabajadora desde hace 30 años es costurera donde realiza trabajos como levantar bastillas,  colocación de cierres, vestidos de novia y quince años, vestidos de graduación y más. Hace años su esposo falleció por lo que quedo sola y tuvo que dedicarse de lleno a la costura ya que sería la única forma en que recibiría ingresos. En este momento Pura necesita de un préstamo para comprar tela, hilos y otros para que sus ventas incrementen.
texts.en: Pura Concepción is a very hardworking woman who has been a seamstress for 30 years. She does work such as raising hems, sewing in zippers, wedding dresses, quincañera dresses, graduation dresses, and more. Her husband passed away several years ago, which meant she was alone and had to work full time in sewing because that was the only way she could have an income. Pura now needs a loan to buy fabric, threads, and other items so that her sales can increase.

loans.use: to buy fabric and threads for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement and sand) to finish her project

loans.name: San Roque Group

texts.es:
La Sra. M.  de 43 años de edad casada, tiene 1 hijo menor de edad  de 13 años  en etapa escolar, mujer luchadora  por salir adelante  frente a los obstáculos  que se les presenta, socia de la alcancía comunal “San Roque”.
Se dedica en la actualidad a la Preparación de Platos Típicos de la Región  como la Pachamanca este plato típico está  preparada a base de papas doradas, carnes asadas,etc. 
El prestamo solicito para la compra de platos,cubiertos y otros. En el futuro desea exportar  la Pachamanca enlatado,  así  incrementar más sus ingresos y poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida  a su familia.
La clienta está ubicada la cuarta lado derecha vestida de casaca blanca polo color celeste.
texts.en:
M. is 43 years old. She is married and has one child who is 13 years old and is in school. She is a woman who works hard to get ahead in spite of the obstacles that present themselves. She is a member of the “San Roque” community bank.

She currently works at making typical foods of the region, such as Pachamaca. This dish is prepared with roasted potatoes as a base, grilled meats, etc. She is asking for the loan to purchase plates, silverware, and other products. In the  future she would like to export canned Pachamanca and thereby increase her income and be able to provide her family with a better quality of life.

She is the one who is fourth from the right, dressed in a white jacket with a blue polo shirt.

loans.use: to purchase plates and silverware

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia is 50 years old and lives in Bacolod; Ozamiz City. She is married with five adult children. 

Celia owns a motorcycle and uses it as her business, operating it within Ozamiz City. She earns approximately 3000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. She has a requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase equipment for her motorcycle. 

Celia has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Celia hopes that she will not encounter failure in her business and can purchase a lot of motorcycles within five years.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her motorcycle

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
Liza is 44 years old and lives in Malaubang, Ozamiz City. She is married with eight school-aged children. 

To earn a living, Liza has a food stall selling a food called fried chicken neck. She earns about 3000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) each month doing this type of work. Liza has a requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase ingredients for her fried chicken neck. 

Liza has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Liza would like to put up a permanent store in Ozamiz for her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making fried chicken necks

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is married with two children. She is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. 

Gina is a farmer and grows pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for three years. She has requested a loan of 12,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to purchase breeding pigs to raise.

Gina has been a member of PMPC for one and a half years. In the future, Gina hopes to improve her family's house.

loans.use: to purchase breeding pigs to raise.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is married with five children. She is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Anita is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 30 years. She has requested a loan of 9,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to purchase fertilizer for rice.

Anita has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Anita hopes to see her children finish college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for rice.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 50 years old and lives in Purok Rizal Bacolod, Ozamiz City. She is married and has 3 children.  Teresita has a tractor for her business and earns approximately PHP 10,000 each month doing this type of business. She has requested a loan to purchase another farm tractor. 

Teresita has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, she hopes to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: buy a tractor

loans.name: Joyas Para Cristo 1 & 2 Group

texts.es:
Carolina es la coordinadora del Grupo Joyas para cristo 1 & 2; compuesto por 10 mujeres empresarias, dedicadas a diferentes actividades de negocio desde ventas misceláneas, de comestibles, salones de belleza, ventas de calzados, frutas y vegetales, entre otros. Sus ventas son realizadas en su comunidad y otras zonas cercanas, ubicada al noreste de la ciudad de Santo Domingo, donde cada día, estas microempresarias buscan mejorar su calidad de vida.

Carolina está recibiendo su cuarto préstamo con Esperanza Internacional, varios de su familia son comerciantes y desde que pudo iniciar su negocio hace unos 5 años, necesito inyectar un poco de capital y fue cuando decidió participar en un grupo que se iba a formar en su comunidad. Su negocio es la venta de productos de belleza, para el cabello, cosméticos, entre otros. Invertirá su ultimo préstamo en mercancías para ampliar su inventario. 

Carolina es una madre viuda con 4 hijos, de los cuales solo 3 aun viven con ella, a los cuales debe cuidar y ayudar con sus sustento, y su educación, dice que su reto mas difícil ha sido superar la muerte de su esposo. Disfruta trabajar en belleza, por lo que espera poder tener un salón, muy pronto y dedicarse a esta actividad de negocio. En nombre de su grupo da la gracias a todos ustedes por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Carolina is the coordinator of Joyas para Cristo 1 & 2 Group, 10 businesswomen dedicated to various business activities, from miscellaneous sales to food, beauty salons, shoe sales, fruits and vegetables, and others.  They sell in their community and in nearby areas, located in the northeast of the city of Santo Domingo, where every day these micro-businesswomen look to improve their quality of life.

Carolina is receiving her fourth loan with Esperanza Internacional.  Several members of her family work in business, and since she managed to start her business some five years ago, she needed to put in a bit of capital; that was when she decided to participate in a group that was going to form in her community. 

Her business is selling beauty products, hair products, and cosmetics, among other products.  She will invest her current loan in merchandise to expand her inventory.
