Con el dinero del crédito cubrirá el costo de una motobomba así mejorar el riego y la producción de tubérculos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia 	Aroma; es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito.
texts.en:
Sr. Zenón is a farmer, but he also works as a mechanic in the city of El Alto. His wife and children help with the farm work and with growing tubers. The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump so that he can improve the irrigation and production of tubers. Zenón lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has two children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan.

loans.use: to buy a water pump for improving irrigation.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Doña Maria tiene la edad de 55 años, madre de ocho hijos, siete casados e independiente, y una niña de 13 años que estudia la secundaria, hoy en dia su trabajo es de domestica, el cual ha venido desempeñando por largos años, asi mismo logro la construccion de su casa, junto  a su excompañero.
Este es su segundo credito en Afodenic, en donde su objetivo es la construcion de baño e inodoro, siendo de plastico y saco, cambio que no habia hecho por falta de capital, ya que tiene que complementar la alimentacion, gastos basicos, educacion, transporte, y sale alcansada cada mes. Ya que por muchos años ha sido madre soltera.
Pero sus hijos y ella se estan esforzando para hacer esta mejora, ya que es de gran necesidad para una mejor higiene de salud, ya que cuando llueve se ve fea la situacion. Es por tal razon comprara, inodoro, mas bloques, arena, cemento, hierro y tubos para aguas negras, pegamento entre otros productos. Para terminar la obra, que vendra ah dar mas comodidad, y limpieza a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 55 years old. She is the mother of eight children, seven of whom are married and independent. She has a 13 year old girl who is in secondary school. She currently works as a domestic worker, which she has done for many years. This is how she managed to build her house, next to her ex-partner. 

This is her second loan with Afodenic. Her goal is to build a bathroom with a toilet. It is currently build of plastic sheeting and old bags. She had not made a change because she didn’t have the capital, due to the fact that she must share in the cost of food, basic expenses, education, transportation, and she is out of money at the end of each month. She has been a single mother for many years.

However, she and her children are working hard to make this improvement since it is a huge necessity for better hygiene; when it rains, it is a bad situation. For this reason she will buy a toilet, cement blocks, sand, cement, re-bar, pipes for wastewater, glue, and other products. She will finish the project in order provide improved comfort and cleanliness for her family.

loans.use: to build a bathroom and install a toilet, which will improve her family's health, safety, and person hygiene

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
El comité "Mujeres Alegres"se originó a través de promociones que se hicieron en el barrio de las miembros. El objetivo de cada de una de ellas es trabajar en equipo, fomentar el espíritu solidario y llegar al nivel máximo del programa.
La sra. Blanca es la presidenta del grupo, esta trabajando en la venta de ropa. Comenta que por medio de su sacrificio y trabajo ella ha podido sobresalir y ayudar a su familia. El deseo de ella es que todas las miembros puedan aumentar sus ingresos para el buen pago de sus obligaciones y logros de los objetivos del grupo.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, ya que estamos a punto de recibir a esa estación del año y siempre en esa época tiene muchos pedidos.
texts.en:
The "Mujeres Alegres" community bank was formed through some promotional work which was carried out in the neighborhood where the bank's members live.  The goals of each of the members are to work as part of a team, to promote a supportive spirit and to reach the top level of the program.

Blanca is the president of this group.  Her business is selling clothes.  She says that through her sacrifice and work, she has been able to do well and help her family.  Her wish is for all the members of her group to increase their incomes so that they can meet their repayments and achieve the aims of the group.

Blanca is requesting this loan to buy summer clothes as we are about to enter that season and she always has a lot of orders at that time of year.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de la ciudad de Encarnación, surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación, el grupo se encuentra en el 1º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde este año. Ellas se unieron con el propósito de generar mayores ingresos para todas y de esa forma mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Elena, la cual tiene 3 hijos, está casada con Cristino, su marido trabaja como Sereno y ella tiene hace varios años un Kiosko. Cuenta Elena que tiene buenas ventas siempre, pues los clientes siempre acuden hasta su local, lo cual le genera buenos ingresos. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles y bebidas para su negocio para venderlos a sus clientes. Ve al crédito como una gran ayuda para seguir con su pequeño negocio.
texts.en:
This group from the city of Encarnación was formed when one of its members contacted Fundación Paraguaya.  The group are in their first loan cycle and this is their first year with Fundación Paraguaya.  They came together with the goal of making more income for each member and thereby improving the living conditions of each of them.

One of the members of this group is Elena.  Elena has three children and is married to Cristino.  Her husband works as a night watchman and she has run a food kiosk for several years.  Elena tells us that she always makes good sales as her customers always come to her business which makes her good income.  She is requesting this loan to buy food and drink to sell to her customers.  She sees the loan as a great help which will enable her to continue running her small business.

loans.use: to buy food and drinks

loans.name: Paula Francis

texts.es:
Doña Paula sigue trabajando como domestica, al igua que su esposo en servicios de vigilancias, sus dos hijos terminando el año escolar en la colegio del barrio.
Como madre su objetivo ha sido la mejora  a su casa, el cual con fondos propios y financiamiento en Afodenic, ha venido logrando mejorar la infraestructura, medio que se le hace mas facil por esta via, ya que equilibra los gastos del hogar.
Con el credito anterior logro terminar muro, que vino a segurar mas su propiedad y seguridad para su familia. y hoy hara la mejora de las divisiones, ya que las que tiene, son de playbo teniendo ya muchos defecto y que ahora lo hara de concreto, asi como el comiemzo del cascote del porche, que espera ir trabajando poco a poco. Contenta por poder solucionar las necesidades, es por eso aunque se sienta cansada muchas veces, se anima al pensar en un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Paula continues working as a domestic employee.  Her husband continues working as a security guard.  Their two children are finishing the academic year in a local school.

As a mother, Paula's goal has been to improve her home.  Using her own funds and loans from Afodenic, she has been improving her home's infrastructure.  It is easier to carry out this work this way as she is able to balance her household expenses.

Paula used her previous loan to finish building a perimeter wall in order to secure her property and provide security for her family.  Now she will improve her home by building some dividing walls, as the ones she currently has are made from plywood.  They have a lot of defects and she would like to be able to build them from concrete.  She would also like to start building the foundations of a porch which she hopes to gradually develop.  Paula is happy to be able to meet her needs and, for this reason, although she often feels tired, she is encouraged by the prospects of a better future.

loans.use: to build dividing walls from concrete and to start building the foundations of a porch in order to provide her family with better hygiene and space

loans.name: Elvis Axamir

texts.es:
Elvis trabaja en su vehículo como taxista, siendo su fuente de ingreso económico. Con el ciclo del préstamo anterior realizo grandes cambios con beneficios para su familia. Se le ha presentado dificultades de salud ya que para los tiempos de lluvia esta tendente a resfriarse ocasionando gasto de medicamentos y disminuyendo sus horas laborales en el taxi. Actualmente requiere comprar repuestos del automóvil que le está dando problema de movilización. Con el préstamo comprara: llantas, batería, le dará mantenimiento a la direccional y la suspensión. 
Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al crecimiento de su pequeño negocio.
texts.en: Elvis works as a taxi driver with his own car, which is his source of income.  In the previous loan cycle, he made some big changes to his house that benefited his family.  He has had health problems, because during the rainy season he has tended to get colds, requiring him to spend money on medicines and reducing his working hours in the taxi.  Now he needs to buy spare parts for his taxi, because he's having some mechanical problems with it.  With this loan he will buy tires and a battery, and he will have maintenance work done on the suspension and the turn signal.  He thanks the lenders for this support to help him grow his small business.

loans.use: to buy auto parts and pay for maintenance work on his taxi

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 32 años de edad, es casado, y tiene dos hijos. Oscar se dedica a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió en su niñez. Dado que Oscar fue huérfano de padre a los 15 años, él ha trabajado desde muy joven para llevarle el sustento a su familia. Por esta razón Oscar no pudo estudiar. Oscar tiene a sus hijos estudiando porque no quiere que ellos sufran como él por no saber escribir ni leer.

Actualmente Oscar se dedica al comercio de cerdos, ya que los ingresos que recibe de la agricultura no son suficientes. Para comprar los insumos que él necesita para su trabajo (concentrado y vitaminas para los animales), Oscar recorre una via que tiene muy mal acceso. Dadas las malas condiciones de la via, el bus solo pasa dos dias por semana. Cuando Oscar tiene alguna emergencia y necesita ir al pueblo un día que no pase el bus, él tiene que caminar dos horas para llegar. Si Oscar tiene que llevar algo de mucho peso, él tiene que contratar un vehículo que lo transporte por $30.

Oscar solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo para la compra de mas cerdos para la cria, y luego venderlos a buen precio. Con el préstamo Oscar tambien comprara el concentrado y las vitaminas necesarias para sus animales. Con mas cerdos Oscar podra tener mejores ingresos y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

En un futuro Oscar espera poder ampliar su casa y compara un vehiculo, asi no dependería de terceros para su trabajo. Él tambien espera que sus hijos estudien una buena profesión y se preparen para ser personas utiles en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Oscar is 32 years old, married and has 2 children. Oscar is a farmer, something he learned as a child. Since Oscar's father died when he was 15 years old, he has worked since an early age to support his family. For this reason Oscar was not able to study. Oscar has his children studying because he does not want his children to suffer as he has by not being able to read or write.

Currently Oscar is in the pig business as the income he receives from farming is not enough. To buy the supplies he needs for his work (concentrates and vitamins for the animals). Oscar uses a road that is in a bad state of repair. Given the poor condition of the road, the bus only passes by twice a week. When Oscar has an emergency and needs to go to town on a day that the bus does not come by, he has to walk for 2 hours to get there. If Oscar has to transport something heavy, he has to hire a vehicle which costs $30.

Oscar is asking Fundación Campo for a loan to purchase more pigs for breeding and then for later sale at a good price. With the loan Oscar will also buy the concentrate and vitamins needed by his animals. With more pigs Oscar will have a better income and improve the quality of life for his family.

In the future Oscar hopes to be able to enlarge his house and buy a vehicle so he would not have to depend on others for his work. He also hopes that his children study a good profession and will be ready to be useful people in their community.

loans.use: to  buy pigs for breeding and selling.

loans.name: Gladis Humbertina

texts.es:
La señora Gladis tiene 37 años de edad, es casada con dos hijos.

Ella se dedica desde hace dos años a administrar su propia tienda, debido a que los ingresos de su esposo no eran suficientes para cubrir los gastos del hogar y también ellos identificaron que en el lugar donde viven esta bien ubicado para ejercer dicha actividad, ya que la mayor parte de los productos se los van a dejar los proveedores a su casa, por que tiene buen acceso y algunas pocas cosas las compra en el pueblo más cercano. En la actualidad Gladis ha sabido administrar la tienda y todo marcha bien.

La señora Gladis, solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para surtir más el negocio comprando granos básicos, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, café, jabón, entre otros y poder comprar las cosas por mayor y de esta manera poder satisfacer la demanda de la comunidad. Ella opina que la necesidad más grande es el capital de trabajo para invertirlo y ampliar más el negocio.

Con el préstamo Gladis podrá ejecutar sus proyectos y obtener mejores ingresos, para ofrecerles un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Ella desea que Dios le regale salud y fuerza para seguir adelante y crecer en su negocio, para salir bien con su compromiso con la Institución para mantener las puertas abiertas y luego realizar otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Señora Gladis is 37 years old, married with 2 children.

She has been working for 2 years managing her own store as her husband's income was not sufficient to cover the household expenses. They also identified the place where they live as a good location to set up the business because most of the products can be dropped off at their house by the suppliers as it has good access and the few other things she needs, she buys at the nearest town. In fact Gladis has known how to manage the store and everyhing is going well.

Señora Gladis is asking Fundación Campo for a loan in order to stock her store more by purchasing dry grains, rice, beans, sugar, coffee, soap, among other products and in this way meet the demands of the comunity. She believes that the greatest need is for working capital to invest in and further expand the business. 

With the loan, Gladis will be able to implement her projects and obtain a better income with which to offer her children a better future. She wishes that God gives her good health and strength so as to get ahead and grow her business and fulfill her obligations with the Fundacion Campo so as to keep the doors open and later do more.

loans.use: to buy more rice, beans, sugar, soap, among other things to stock her store.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
El señor Ismael esta agradecido por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual invirtió en comprar de cierta mercancía para la venta. 
Solicita un préstamo para invertir en compra de mercancía que es (material para construcciones y accesorios para el baños) ya que le esta haciendo falta esta mercancía a su negocio y nos quiere descapitalizar el negocio. 
Desea mejorar la inversión de su negocio y la calidad de vida y la seguridad de su familia. 
Con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas del negocio planea pagar el crédito y que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
texts.en:
Señor Ismael is grateful for your cooperation with his previous loan, which he invested in purchasing some merchandise for sale.  

He is requesting a loan to invest in purchasing merchandise (construction materials and bathroom accessories) which his business currently lacks, and he wants us to decapitalize his business.

He wants to improve investment in his business and into his quality of life and family security.

With part of the earning he will get from his business' sales, he plans to pay back the loan.  His sales are his source of income for his family

loans.use: to invest in purchasing merchandise for his hardware business.
